śrutismṛtītihāsānām abhiprāyavidavyaya // 54 //

śrutivyākhyānatas tuṣyād vidyātīrthamaheśvaraḥ / 154 //

taṃ devaṃ praṇatārtināśanakaraṃ tatvātmanā bhāvayan /

pravhī bhāvam upāgato 'smi satataṃ gopālabālaṃ harim //

ācārya mandārataru prabhūta vākpuṣpasadbrahmamarandapāne /

bhṛṅgāya bhāno 'karavaṃ viśeṣād udbhūtavijñānavinodaṭīkām //2//

śrutismṛtinyāyasamūhamālagdhante munīndro 'vagataprabodhaḥ //

yas tasya buddher na hi bodhyam anyad evaṃ hi satyaṃ śapathaṃ karomi //2//

śrīmajjagannāthamūnīśvarāṇāṃ pādāravinde bhramarāyamānaḥ /

śrībālagopālayatīdracandraḥ śrībālakṛṣṇondravaraprasāda //4//

rākānte rūddhalaṅkacyutakapikadano dhūmradṛkvajradaṃṣṭau //

bhaṅtvā kaṃpaṃ prahastaṃ daśamukhamukuṭaṃ kuṃbhakarṇātikāyau //

brahmāstracchinnakumbhādikam atha makarākṣaṃ tu hatvaindraśatruṃ .. /

jitvā ghastrais tribhis taṃ savalam apaharad rāvaṇaṃ rāmacandraḥ //1//

apa-(fol. 3b)-diśya veṅkaṭeśaḥ svahastasaṃsaktakalikātulyaṃ //

abhayapradānasāraṃ guruprasādāt svayaṃ vyalikhat //1//

prāptiprakāraprapañco daśamo 'dhikāraḥ //1//

ekabudhyā tu sarveśe mano deve nivedayet /

nāhaṃ deho na ca prāṇo nendriyāṇi tathaiva ca // 7 //

na manohaṃ na buddhiś ca naiva cittamahaṃkṛtiḥ // 8 //

iti śaṅkarācārya tā adhyātmavidyā saṃpūrṇā cha …

fol. 2a (in a different writing):

japo jalpaśilpaṃ sakalam api mudrā viracitā /

gatiprādakṣiṇye kramaṇamaśanāghāhutividhiṃ //

praṇāmaḥ saṃveśo sukham akhilam ātmārpaṇadaṣāsaparyāparyāyas tava bhavatu dhanye vilasitāṃ // 9 //
yasya deve parā bhaktiḥ etc. iti śruteḥ //
tasyaite kathitā hyarthāḥ prakāsan(fol. 19b)

gaṃbhīr abhāvā ṭīkeyaṃ vyākhyātā bālabhāvataḥ /

kiṃcid vijṛṃbhitaṃ cātra tad gṛhṇantu vimatsarāḥ //

mṛtkṛtir doṣakīrṇāpi jñānendrānatipūrvikā /

mahannibandhasaṃbandhā prāpsyati pracayaṃ bhuvi //

kṛtyānayā raghupatiḥ paramātmā kuladaivataṃ /

saṃtuṣyatu śukālāpais tatpoṣakajano yathā //
WAS UPLICATE

te sarva tāpopaśāntāḥ santaḥ paramānandaprāptāḥ sarve duḥkhasaṃjñavātsaṃsārāt mucyanta eveti siddhaṃ //144// cha // evam asmin saṃsāre jananamaraṇāgninicaye dīrghena kālena santaptāḥ santa ihāmutrāt phalabhogād viraktā ye niḥśreyasakāṅkṣiṇas teṣāṃ karūṇayākalitena śrīmadbhagavatācāryeṇa śaṅkareṇa pratīteyaṃ surasarittāpovaśa manī hy aparokṣānubhūtis tatra tasyānukampayaiva bhīmātaṭa kṛtavilāsavigrahaśrīmannityānandānucarācareṇa mayā taccaraṇāmbujaparāgasurasagandhitamanasā śāstrādi vyutpattivīhīnatayaiva kevalayā bhaktyā preritena kṛtam i-(fol.148a)-daṃ vivaraṇaṃ tatprītaya evāstu na kadāciddambhāyety om //60 - //

nityānandaparāceraśaparavit pādāvanejañjala /

pītvā janma śatakṛtaṃ tvadyamaho tīrtvā tu janmapradāṃ /

saṃbhitvāṃ suvirūḍhakarmakaṇikāṃ kṛtvā ca tasmin mana-//

-stannāmasmaraṇānuvādanasukhaṃ labdhaṃ tu bhaktālaye //1//

aviditapadabhāṣaḥ kāvyavyutpatihīnor bhajanavidhivimūḍhaḥ kevalas tvadvirāgī //

tava padaratabhaktyāḥ prerito 'haṃ tv ayogyaḥ /

kṛtam idam akhilātman paṇḍharīśa kṣamasva //2//

nityānandaṃ sadāśāntam advaitaṃ śivam avyayaṃ /

smṛtvāyaṃ racito hy arthas tasyaiva śivasaṃjñayā //3//

pāpīyaso 'pi śaraṇāgataśabdabhājo

nopekṣaṇaṃ mama tavocitam īśvarasya /

tvat jñānaśakti karunāsu satīṣu neha

pāpaṃ parākramitum (fol. 11b) arhati māmakīnam //63//

yasya deve parābhakti (19a) yathā debe tathā gurau /

tasyaite kathitā hy arthāḥ prakāśyan(ṃ)te mahātmanaḥ//

ebhiraṅgaiḥ samāyukto rājayoga udāhṛtaḥ //

kiñcitpakvakaṣāyāṇāṃ haṭhayogena saṃyutaḥ //143 //

prasīdatāṃ hayagrīvaḥ śrīnivāso jagadguruḥ /

ebhir aṅgaiḥ samāyukto rājayogaḥ prakīrtitaḥ //

Text: - paripakvaṃ mano yeṣāṃ ….. /

…… sarveṣāṃ sulabho javāt //42//

Comm. – haṭhapradīpādānekaśāstraprayuktātmaprāptyartham anekakleśataradāyakasādhanatiraskārapūrvakatayānenaiva granthoktasādhanābhyāsena sulabhatayā saccidānandalābhau bhavatīty evaṃ sudhiyo bibhāvayantu //42/

aparokṣānubhūtes tu samyagarthāvabodhane //

yathāmati mayākāri śubhaiṣā bodhadīpikā //42//

nityānandasamāhā ceccharayo bhuvi bhāvukāḥ /

prapañcāndhavināśāya sevyatāṃ bodhadīpikā //43//

jambudvīpasumaṇḍitā jayapurī dharmārthakāmānvitā /

vidyānekavicārasāranicayā bhūpaiḥ sadā vanditā //

tasyāṃ śrīguruśaṅkarasya ca guror vaṃśapradīpo mahān

yātaḥ śrīgurūdevadeva iha vai tejogiris tejasāḥ //44//

tasyaiva kṛpayā mayā viracitā //

Ends: fol. 14a.

mamārthāvagatir jātā durbodhe 'pyatra niścitam // 1 //

Ends fol. 146a

kutarkadaśanāvalī vikaṭavādiyādogaṇa-

śritaśrutimahārṇave smṛtiguṇāvalambān mudā //

nimajya bhagavatkṛpātibaladhārakānugrahāt

kṛte manana uddhṛto maṇir ayaṃ mayā vāṅmayaḥ //1//

eṣa puṣpāñjaliḥ śrīmadācāryacaraṇāmbuje //

samarpitas tena dāse mayi tuṣyantu te sadā //2//

ye vaidikaṃ manyatayātyanalpais tudanti sādhūn kaṭukūṭajalpaiḥ /

sa eṣa teṣu prahṛtaḥ prahastas tādṛk khalo yena bhaved vihastaḥ //3//

etaṃ nidhāya nikaṭe praṇatiṃ vidhāya

śiṣṭechidaṃ savinayaṃ vinivedayāmi //

helopahāsavidha yasya vilokya kiñcit

kālaṃ budhāḥ karuṇayaiva kṛtārthanīyaḥ //4//

nāmāvalīṃ pravakṣyāmi keśavasyātivallabhām //

    fol. 4a

    iti vālacaritrasya nāmnām āṣṭottaraṃ śatam //

kṛṣṇabhaktihṛdānandikīrttanād bhaktibodhakam //

nāmānyatha pravakṣyāmi yaiḥ santuṣyati keśavaḥ //

ataḥ paraṃ pravikṣyāmi rājalīlām upāśritaḥ //

Ends: fol. 10a

nirodhalīlām āśritya bhaktyau bhakte nirūpitam //

r biḍaṃvidum ataś ca tṛpyati sa kiṃ doṣaḥ (2b) payo bālayoḥ // 12 //

janmādyasya yata iti bhagavatā sūtrakāreṇa jagadudayādinimittakāraṇatvaṃ parasya brahmaṇo lakṣaṇam abhihitaṃ na ca jagatsatyatām antareṇa tadvāstavaṃ sambhavati // etc.

fol. 1b

granthādau maṅgalam ācarati / viśvasyeti // taṃ viśvotpattyādihetuṃ ramāvallabhaṃ vanda ity uktvā granthādāv avaśyavandanīyāyāḥ sakalavāṅma(na)sa nityaniyāmikāyā devyā api bhagavadupasarjanatayā vandanaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati / etc.

fol. 1b

atha bhagavadbhaktir vivicyate / tatra pūrṇapuruṣottamasambandhi jñānakarmādikaṃ bhaktir ucyate / madarthamatkarmāṇīti vākyāt / pūrṇaḥ puruṣottamaḥ śrīrāmaḥ sakalaśāstrasiddhāntitavedapurāṇādivacanaiḥ pratipādyate / etc.

fol. 1b

yady api bhagavatpādair eva pramāṇalakṣaṇādikam abhihitaṃ tathāpi gambhīrayā vācā vikṣipya varṇitam // na mandaiḥ sukhena śakyate boddhum iti tadartham idam ārabhyate // yo dharmo lakṣye vyāptyā varttate na varttate vānyatra sa lakṣaṇam ity ucyate //etc.

Begins fol. 2a

sarva… svāvakāśaprathamakṛpāguru gṛhyamāṇaḥ kadācin muktaiśvaryādi sampannidhir api kaścid ityaṃ vipaścit… ddhātādhikāraḥ prathamaḥ // etc.

fol. 1b

iha khalu sukham eva me syāt duḥkhaṃ manāg api mābhūd iti nikhilāpekṣitamokṣasyeśvarasākṣātkāram antareṇa ...

agre darśayati // etc.

 

Text:

aśeṣagurum īśeśaṃ nārāyaṇam anāmayaṃ /

sampraṇamya pravakṣyāmi pramāṇānāṃ svalakṣaṇam // etc.

ādhivyādhi... ātmasukhadaur dvaiteka niṣṭhasya yaḥ //
yo gaṅgām avatīrṇavān vasumatīṃ kā … kṛtau kaleḥ /
saṃccichaṃbhaya eṣa pātu bhagavān līlābhavas trayaṃbakaḥ // 1//
…nanv īśvarasya jagadavanādikarttṛtve bhānaṃ na paśyāmaḥ / pratyutāpāmasa…m amṛtā abhūmety ādi śrutayaḥ karmaṇaiva hi saṃsiddhim āsithatājanakādaya ity ādyanantā smṛtayaś ca karmaṇa eva karttṛtvapratipādanaparā anubhūyanta iti ced viśvasya karttā bhuvanasya goptety ādi śrutibhiḥ sacicadānandasvarūpasya cetanasyeśvarasyaiva tatkarttṛtva pratipādanād acetanasya karmaṇas tadvadasaṃbhavācca etc.

etad vilakṣaṇaḥ kaścit vicāraḥ so 'yam īdṛśaḥ // 13 //

ajñānaprabhavaṃ sarvaṃ jñānena pravilīyate // etc.

etad vilakṣaṇaḥ kaścit vicāraḥ so 'yam īdṛśaḥ // 13 //

ajñānaprabhavaṃ sarvaṃ jñānena pravilīyate // etc.

śrīharaṃ paramānandam upadeṣṭāramīśvaram /

vyāpakaṃ sarvalokānāṃ kāraṇāntaṃ namāmy aham //1//

aparokṣānubhūtir vai procyate mokṣasiddhaye /

sadbhir eva prayatnena vīkṣaṇīyā muhurmuhuḥ //2//

svavarṇāśramadharmeṇa etc.

Begins: fol. 1b.

oṃ tapobhiḥ kṣīṇapāpānāṃ śāntānāṃ vītarāgiṇāṃ /

mumukṣūṇām apekṣyo 'yam ātmabodho vidhīyate // 1 //

bodho 'nyastadhanebhyo hi sākṣānmokṣaikasādhanaṃ /

pākasya vanhivajjñānaṃ vinā mokṣo na siddhyati // 2 // etc.

kadācinnārado yogī parānugrahavāñ chayā /

paryaṭan sakalān lokān satyalokam upāgamat //1// etc

Begins: fol. 1b (of section 1)

Text: oṃ sītārāmābhyāṃ namaḥ / śrīmahādeva uvāca //

yathāvadbhāṣitaṃ vākyaṃ śrūtvā rāmo hanūmataḥ /

uvācānantaraṃ vākyaṃ harṣeṇa mahatāvṛtaḥ // 1 // etc.

Com.: śrīgaṇeśāya namaḥ // yathāvad iti // 1 // yad anyena manasā smartum api na śakyam ity anvayaḥ // 2 // etc.

Begins: fol. 1b

kṛdhṇāya saccidānandatanave paramātmane //

namo vidhīyate tredhā gurave ca tadātmane //

śraddhābhaktīpuraskṛtya sampradāyānusārataḥ //

vyākhyāsye 'haṃ yathāśakti taittirīyakavārttikam //

sadanantacidānande jagatī yatra jāyate

rajatādīva…. devāhaṃ parāgatiḥ // etc.

śrīnārāyaṇatīrthānāṃ pādāṃbujarajo bhaje //

yadanudhyānamāhātmyād anuyāyi sarasvatī //1//

tatkāryeti tannāśanāśyety arthaḥ etc.

mā bhaiṣṭety amṛtaṃ syandi sukhacandramanoharaṃ //

govardhanadharaṃ dhārādharadhaureyam āśraye // 1 //

śrīnārāyaṇatīrthānāṃ padapaṅkeruhasmṛtiḥ //

smṛtim avyāhatāṃ kuryāt sadāpadapadārthayoḥ // 2 //

śrīraṅgamaṅgalamahotsavavardhanāya
vedāntapānthaparamārthasamarthanāya /
kaiṅkaryalakṣaṇavilakṣaṇamokṣalakṣmyai
rāmānujo vijayate yatirājarājaḥ // 1 //

śrīmānakhilalokānāṃ nāyakaḥ karuṇākaraḥ //
karotu maṅgalaṃ puṃsāṃ kamalānāyako hariḥ //

Begins: fol. 1b.

ūrṃ asya gītāsārastotramantrasya urṅkārasya brahmāviṣṇumaheśvaraiśvarasadāśiva ṛṣiḥ // gāyatrī triṣṭup nuṣṭup chandāṃsi //   agnir vāyuḥ sūryo devatā // ṛgyajuḥsāmatatvaṃ // āhavanīgārhapatyadakṣaṇāgnisthānāni // bhūr bhuvakṣetraṃ // akāro bījaṃ ukāraḥ śaktiḥ // makāraḥ kīlakaṃ / urṃmityekākṣaraṃ brahma mokṣārthe jape viniyogaḥ //

Begins: fol. 1a.​

śrīgurucaraṇadvandvaṃ vande 'haṃ mathitaduḥsahadvandvam //

bhrāntigrahopaśāntiṃ pāṃsumayaṃ yasya bhasitam ātanute // 1 //

deśivaraṃ dayāluṃ vande 'haṃ nihatasakalasandehaṃ //

yaccaraṇadvayam advayanubhavam upadiśati tatvamasyartham // 2 //

saṃsāradāvapāvakasantaptaḥ sakalasādhanopetaḥ /

svātmanirūpaṇanipuṇaiḥ vākyaiḥ śiṣyaḥ prabodhyate guruṇā // 3 // etc.

śuddhānandapadāmbhojadvandvamadvandvatāspadaṃ /

namas kurve puras kartur tatvajñānamahodayam // 2 //

gauḍapadīyabhāṣyaṃ hi prasannamiva lakṣate /

tadarthato 'tigambhīraṃ vyākarīṣye svaśaktitaḥ // 3 //

pūrve yady api vidvāṃso vyākhyānam iha cakrire /

tathāpi mandabuddhīnām upakārāya yatyate // 4 //

praṇamya rāmābhidham ātmadhīpadaṃ jagatprasūtisthitisaṃyamāyanaṃ //

tadātmakān śaṅkarapūrvakān gurūn mayopadeśāryavibhāga ucyate // 1 //  etc...

Begins fol 1a

māyākalpitamātṛtāsukhamṛṣādvaitaprapañcāsrayaḥ //

satyajñānamukhātmakaḥ śrutijñikhotthākhaṇḍadhīgocaraḥ //

mithyābandhavidhūnanena paramānandaikatānātmakaṃ

mokṣaṃ prāpta iva svayaṃ vijayate viṣṇur vikalpojjhitaḥ // 1 //

śrīrāmaviśveśvaramādhavānām aikyena sākṣātkṛtamādhāvānām //

sparśe na nirdhūtatamorajobhyaḥ pādotthitebhyo 'stu namo rajobhyaḥ // 2 //

bahubhir vihitā budhaiḥ parārthaṃ vijayante mitavistṛtā nibandhāḥ //

mama tu śrama eṣa nūnam ātmaṃ bharitāṃ bhāvayituṃ bhaviṣyatīha // 3 //

śraddhādhanena muninā madhusūdanena /

saṃgrahya śāstranicayaṃ racitātiyatnāt //

bodhāya vādivijayāya ca satvarānām

advaitasiddhir iyam astu mude budhānām // 4 //​

modāyānayanāḥ pravṛttimabhajanneke gajaṃ lakṣituṃ /

te sevanta tadīyabodhakam atha pratyekam ādhīraṇaṃ //

ekaikāṅgamasaugajo 'yam iti tān agrāhayat tasya ca /

jñātvā te vyavadanta yatra bahudhā tasmai gajāyoṃ namaḥ // 1//

śivaṃ praṇamya saśivaṃ stotre pīyuṣanirjhare /

antargataṃ bhidābhedapaṭuṃ ślokaṃ vivṛṇmahe // 2 //

modāyeti eve anayanāḥ kecidandhāḥ modāya harṣāya etc.

Begins fol. 1a:

Text : īśvareṇāpi jīvena sṛṣṭaṃ dvaitaṃ vivacyate //

viveke sati jīvena heyobandhaḥ sphuṭībhavet // 1// etc.

 

Comm: gurave namaḥ //

natvā śrībhāratītīrthavidyāraṇyamunīśvarau //

mayādvaitavivekasya kriyate padayojanā //1//

cikīrṣitasya granthasya niṣpratyūhaparipūraṇāyābhilaṣitadevatātvānusmaraṇalakṣaṇamaṅgalam ācarannasya vedāntaprakaraṇatvācchāstrīyam evānubandhacatuṣṭayaṃ siddhavatkṛtyagranthārambhaṃ pratijānanīte // iśvareṇeti // etc.
hariharasarasvatī yadgururīḍyaḥ etc.

citsadānandaparūpāya savandhīvṛttisākṣiṇe /

namo vedāntavedyāya brahmaṇo 'nantarūpiṇe // 1 //

yadajñānādidaṃ bhāti yatjñānāt vinivarttate //

namaḥ tasmai cidānandavapuṣe paramātmane // 2 //

fol. 2a Text:

 

tapobhiḥ kṣīṇapāpānāṃ … /

fol. 2b mumukṣūṇāṃ … vidhīyate // 1 // etc

Begins: fol: 1a Text:

nṛsiṃham akhilājñānatimirāśiśir adyuti //

saṃpraṇamya pravakṣyāmi kathālakṣaṇamañjasā //1// etc.

Comm:

śrīvedavyāsāya namaḥ //

śriyaḥ kamitur ānamya caraṇāṃvuruhadvayaṃ //

yathābodhaṃ vidhāsyāmaḥ kathālakṣaṇapañcikāṃ //1//

atha kathāṃ lilakṣayiṣur ācāryaḥ etc.

Comm. fol. 1b:

praṇamya rāmābhidham ātmadhīpadaṃ etc.

Begins: fol. 1b Comm:

śuklāmbaradharaṃ etc.

Begins. - fol. 1a

Text:

// muktim ichasi cet tāta viṣayān viṣavat tyaja // etc.

 

Comm. -

// rḍ namaḥ śrīparamātmane //

yadājñānājjagajjātaṃ yad vijñānād vilīyate // etc.


Ends. - fol. 91a Text.-

avadhutānubhūteś ca ślokasaṅkhyākramā amī // cha //

ityaṣṭāvakraḥ //

oṃ praṇamya paramātmānaṃ śrīvidyātīrtharūpiṇaṃ //
vaiyāsikanyāyamālāślokaiḥ saṃgṛhyate sphuṭam // 1 //
mandabunugrahāya vyāsaproktavedāntavākyārthanirṇāyikādhikaraṇamālāsphuṭaṃ ślokaiḥ saṅgṛhyate ity arthaḥ // etc.

Text. - śrīhariṃ paramānandaṃ etc.

Comm.- // śrīgaṇeśāya namaḥ // śrīdakṣiṇāmūrttiśrīyai namaḥ /

svaprakāśaś ca hetur yaḥ paramātmā cidātmakaḥ // etc.
śrīmanmahāprasādaparamabhāgavatapādapadmaparāgakaṇike jayataḥ // ? /

Comm.-

śrīmatsadgurumānamya santadāsaṃ haripriyam //

aṣṭāvakrasya ṭīkā tatkriyate bhāṣayā mayā // 1 //​

Fol 1b

vāgīśādyāḥ sumanasaḥ sarvārthānām upakrame / etc.

yaṃ natvā kṛtakṛtyāḥ syus taṃ namāmi gajānanam //1// etc.

Begins: fol. 1b

nandikeśvarakṛtā kāśikā ṭīkā samālikhyate //

oṃ namaḥ śivāya devāya sarvajñāya parātmane //

yasyonmeṣanimeṣābhyāṃ vyaktāvyaktam idaṃ jagat //1//

śrīśaṃ guruṃ kumāraṃ ca śaivatattvaviśāradaṃ //

praṇamya nandikeśādīn śivabhaktān muhurmuhuḥ //2//

śrīśaṅkaram iti pāṭḥāntaraṃ //

kāśikām ādisūtrāṇāṃ nandikeśakṛtāṃ śubhāṃ//

lokopakāriṇīṃ divyāṃ vyākaromi yathāmati //3//

fol. 1b:

/ vāgīśādyāḥ sumanasaḥ etc.

citsadānandarūpāya sarvadhīvṛttisākṣiṇe //

namo vedāntavedyāya brahmaṇe 'nantarūpa(pi)ṇe // 1 //

yad ajñānād ida(daṃ) bhāti (yaj)jñānād vinivarttate //

namas tasmai cidānandavapuṣe paramātmane // 2 //

adhā(thā)dhyātmavidyopadeśavidhi(dhiṃ) vyākhyāsyāmaḥ / etc.

śṛīvaṃśīdharamiśrāṇāṃ gurūṇāṃ caraṇasmṛtiḥ /

bhūyān me sādhikeṣṭānām aniṣṭānāṃ ca bādhikā // 1 //

advaitasidhivyākhyānaṃ sadāsukhena dhimatā /

saṃkṣiptaṃ candrikārtheva kriyate sāracandrikā // 2//

iha khalu vṛndāvanayamunātaṭakuñjavihārinikhilagopīmanohāridvaityāritatvamātrānurāgabaddho bodhādyartham advaitasiddhiprakaraṇam ārabhamāṇo madhusūdanābhidheyo yativaro vighnanivṛttaye granthasamāptaye vā svahṛdyanuṣṭitasveṣṭadevatātatvānusmaraṇalakṣaṇam maṅgalaṃ śiṣyaṣikṣārthaṃ ślokenopanibadhnāti māyeti // etc.

oṃ namāmi sadguruṃ śāntaṃ brahmānandamunīśvaraṃ /

yatkṛpālavaleśena sattarkasphuraṇaṃ mama // 1//

śrīmannārāyaṇācāryaṃ sanātanaśivaṃ tadā /

vande 'haṃ vāṅmanaḥkāyair dvaitadhvāntanivṛttaye // 2 //

śrutisiddhaṃ ca yad brahma saccidānandam advayaṃ /

tad atra cintyate tarkair manomalanivṛttaye // 3 //

oṃ īśvarānugrahād eva puṃsām advaitavāsaṇā //

mahadbhayaparitrāṇaṃ dvitrāṇam upajāyate // 1 //

yenedaṃ pūritaṃ sarvam ātmanaivātmanātmani //

nirākaraṃ kathaṃ vande hyabhinnaṃ śivamadvayaṃ // 2 // etc.

śrīmānakhilalokānāṃ nāyakaḥ karuṇākaraḥ //
karotu maṅgalaṃ puṃsāṃ kamalānāyako hariḥ //

Comm. -

// śrīgaṇeśāya namaḥ //

yadājñānājjagajjātaṃ yad vijñānād vilīyate //

taṃ natvā saccidānandaṃ kurvehyadhyātmadīpikām //

iha tāvadātmānandānubhava etc.

Begins: fol. 1b Comm:

śuklāmbaradharaṃ viṣṇuṃ śaśivarṇaṃ caturbhujaṃ /

prasannavadanaṃ dhyāyet sarvavighnopaśāntaye /1/

Begins: fol. 1b

namaskṛtya hariṃ vakṣye tadguṇānāṃ vibhedakān /

bhāvān viṃśatidhā bhinnān sarvasandehavārakān /1/

​

Comm.- fol. 1b

 

śrīśaṅkarācāryanavāvatāraṃ viśveśvaraṃ viśvagūruṃ praṇamya /

kadācinnārado yogī parānugrahavāñ chayā /

paryaṭan sakalān lokān satyalokam upāgamat //1// etc

Begins: fol. 1b Comm.:

natvā śrībhāratītīrthavidyāraṇyamunīśvarau

kurve kūṭasthadīpasya vyākhyāṃ tātparyadīpikāṃ // 1 // etc.

kaivalyānandayogīndrapādakañjaro raviḥ /
rājate me hṛadākāśe mohadhvāntanivarttakaḥ // 3 //

śraddhānandapadāṃbojadvandvaṃ seve yadudbhavaṃ /
nirvāṇarasamāsādya hṛṣṭāḥ śiṣyālipaṅktayaḥ // 4 //

saccidānandayogīndrā jāyante bhuvi kecana /
yatkṛpāvalatestīrṇo mayā sansāravāridhiḥ // 5 //

śrīrāmaṃ paramānandaṃ etc.

Samaślokī: - śrīmanmahāgaṇapataye namaḥ / śrīmatsakalatatvapradarśakāya sāmbāya namaḥ //

śrīgaurīnāthatatvaṃ sakalamunikṛtaṃ vedavedāntavidyaṃ sākṣātkaivalyarūpaṃ vidhiharinamitaṃ bhogamokṣpradaṃ ca //

satyaṃ jñānādirūpaṃ prakaṭitam akarot brahmanirvāṇam ekaṃ

vande 'haṃ sevakānām akhilasukhakaraṃ śaṅkarācāryamūrttiṃ //1//

vandūni śrīmukundānte aparokṣānubhūtici /

samaślokī karitase ṭikā mūlāci sārikhī //2//

śrīrāmaparamānanda śrīgurūśrīśa jo tayā /

vandito sarvalokācyā kāraṇā vyāpakāsa mīṃ //1// etc

kaṭākṣakiraṇācāntanamanmohābdhaye namaḥ
anantānandakṛṣṇāya jaganmaṅgalamūrttaye //1// etc.

Begins: fol. 19b:

śrīgurur jayati //

hariharasarasvatīyadgururīḍyaṃ paramahaṃsānāṃ //
sa jagatrāthapadottarasarasvatīśabdapadasaṃvedyaḥ // 1 //
karmadikaṇṭhālaṃkārasāraṃ vedāntavāridheḥ /
racayatyamalaṃ grantham advaitāmṛtasaṃjñakaḥ // 2 //
āsīd yativaraḥ kaścid vivekāśramasaṃjñakaḥ /
yatprasādena bahavo muktimārgam upāgatāḥ //3//

vāgīśādyā sumanasaḥ sarvārthānām upakrame /
yaṃ natvā kṛtakṛtyāḥ syus taṃ namāmi gajānanam //1//

aitareyeṇa saṃproktā dvitīyāraṇyakāntagā //

brahmavidyā suvispaṣṭaṃ bālabodhāya varṇyate // 1 //

ātmaiva sṛṣṭeḥ prāgāsīn nāmarūpavivarjitaḥ //

so 'py eka eva nānyosti jaḍaṃ cānyaṃ na vidyate // 2 //

māyāṃ tu prakṛtiṃ vidyānmāyinaṃ tu maheśvaraṃ //

iti śrutyantare proktā māyā nānyātra tatvataḥ // 3 // etc.

śrīparāśarabhaṭṭāryaḥ śrīraṅgeśapurohitaḥ //

śrīvatsāṅkasutaḥ śrīmān śreyase me 'stu bhūyase // 1 //

vande 'haṃ ghaṭakādrīśaṃ śrīnidhiṃ karuṇānidhiṃ //

vādhūlakuladevaṃ taṃ satāmanavadhīṃ nidhim // 2  //

akhilacidacidīśaḥ śrīnivāso dayāluḥ /

svapadakamalayugmaprāpakaḥ saṃśrītānāṃ //

nigamaśikharagamyo nityam avyājambadhur-

vilasatu mama citte veṅkaṭeśo mukundaḥ // 3 //

praṇamya deśikān sarvānaṣṭaślokyā yathāśrutaṃ //

artho vaiṣṇavadāsena bālabodhāya varṇyante // 4 //

Begins: fol. 1b

Comm.:

khalu iha bhagavān śaṅkarācārya uttamādhikāriṇāṃ … etc.

yo nityam acyutapadāmbujayugmarukmavyāmohitas taditarāṇi tṛṇāya me ne //

asmadguror bhagavato 'sya dayaikasindho rāmānujasya caraṇau śaraṇaṃ prapadye // 1 //

taruṇatapanavarṇaṃ karṇalīlāvadhūta- /

bhramaranivahaguñjākarṇanodbhūtaharṣa //

amaracarakirīṭo dhṛṣṭapādābjamantaḥ /

sphuratu dalitavighraṃ hanti vaktraṃ maho naḥ // 1 //

kṛpālalitavīkṣaṇaṃ smitamanojñavaktrāṃbujaṃ //

śaśāṅkakalayojvalaṃ śasitaghoratātatrayaṃ /

karotu kimapi sphuranparamasaukhyasaccidvapuḥ /

dharādharasutābhujodvalayitaṃ maho maṅgalaṃ // 2 // etc.

Fol. 1b

śrīgaṇeśāya namaḥ //

varam abhayam udāraṃ pustakaṃ cākṣahāraṃ

maṇivalayamanojñaiḥ pāṇipadmair dadhānā- /

sitavasanalalāmākundamuktābhirāmā /

vasatu śaśinibhāsyād vāci vāgdevatā naḥ // 1 // etc.

ya uddadhīrasavān taṃ vande śrīvallabhaṃ prabhuṃ // 1 //

nanu sarvapadaṃ traivarṇikabhinnaparatvenātra vyākhyātavyaṃ // etc.

Begins: fol. 1b

natvā śrībhāratītīrthavidyāraṇyamunīśvarau /

pratyaktatvavivekasya kriyate padadīpikā // 1 //

prāripsitasya granthasyāvighnena parisamāptipracayagamanābhyāṃ śiṣṭācārapariprāptim iṣṭadevatāgurunamaskāralakṣaṇaṃ maṅgalācaraṇaṃ svenānuṣṭhitaṃ…sūcayati //

namaḥ śrīśaṅkarānandagurupādāmbujanmane /

savilāsamahāmohagrāhagrāsaikakarmaṇe // etc.

Comm:

vidhūtavividhānarthakalpanaṃ kalpanāsyada /

anantānandasando 'haṃ taṃ vande puruṣottamam // 1 //

yasya prasādam āsādya sadgatiṃ bahavo gatāḥ /

tam ahaṃ pratyahaṃ vande śuddhānandapadaṃ gurum // 2 //

māyākalpitamātṛtāmukhamṛṣādvaitaprapañcāśrayā /

satyajñānasukhātmakaḥ śrutiśikhotthākhaṇḍadhīgocaraḥ //

mithyābandhavidhūnanena paramānandaikatānātmakaṃ /

mokṣaṃ prāpta iva svayaṃ vijayate viṣṇur vikalpo 'ṅgita // 1 //

 

śrīrāmaviśveśvaramādhavānāṃ aikyena sākṣātkṛtamādhavānāṃ //

sparśena niddhūtatamo rajo 'lpaḥ pādotthilpoṣṇatamo rajasyaḥ // 2 // etc.

kathaṃ jñānam avāpnoti muktiḥ kena bhaviṣyati //

vairāgyaṃ ca kathaṃ prāpyam etad brūhi mama prabho // 1 //

yadajñanāj jagajjātaṃ yadvijñānād vilīyate //

taṃ natvā saccidānandaṃ kurve 'dhyātmapradīpikām // 2 //​

Begins: fol. 1b.

śrīmaṅgalamūrttīr jayati //

Comm. -

saccidānandam advaitaṃ sarvādhisthānam uttamam //

natvāṣṭāvakrasūktasya dīpikā tanyate parā // 1 //

 

śrīmadgopālacaitanyena racite mayā dīpikā vistāryakrīyate // sakalavidvajjanakṛpākaṭākṣasantuṣṭacetasā mayā vistīrya ṭīkā kriyate// ityadhyāhāra iha

khalu jñānavijṇānasampannaḥ paramakāruṇiko 'ṣṭāvakramuniḥ // muktikāmanayā samupetaṃ kañcicchiṣyaṃ śamadamādyadhikāropadeśapūrvakam ātmatatvam ūpadiśati // muktim icchasīti //

ya eko niṣkalaḥ śutdhastan namāmi jagadaguruṃ /

kṛṣṇaṃ viṣṇuṃ hṛṣīkeśaṃ keśavaṃ kleśanāśanam //1//

sarvadevamayaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ natvā tatpādapaṅkajaṃ /

sannidhāyya hṛdambhoje parānandamayo 'smy aham //2//etc./

śrīmānveṅkaṭanāthāryyaḥ kavitārkikakesarī //

vedānttācāryavaryo me sannidhattāṃ sadā hṛdi //1/

jayatyāśritasaṅtrāsadhvāntavidhvaṃsanodayaḥ //

prabhāvānsītayā devyā paramavyomabhāskaraḥ //2//

prāyaḥ prapadane puṃsāṃ paunaḥ punyaṃ nivārayan //

hastaśrīraṅgabharttur mām avyād abhayamudritaḥ //3//

namastamai kasmai ca na bhavatu niṣikiñcana jana /

svayaṃ rakṣādīkṣā samadhikasamindhānayaśase //

surādhīśasvairakṣaṇakupitaśāpāyudhavadhū /

dṛṣattāhurjātapraśamanapadāmbhojarajase //4//

paritrāṇāya sādhūnāṃ vināśāya ca duṣkṛtāṃ //

dharmasaṃsthāpanārthāya sambhavāmi yuge yuge //5//

kapardimatakardamaṃ kapilakalpanāvāgurāṃ /

duraty ayam atītya yadruhiṇatantrayantrodaraṃ //

kudṛṣṭikuhanāmukhe nipatitaḥ parabrahmaṇaḥ /

karagrahavicakṣaṇo jayati lakṣaṇo 'yaṃ muniḥ // 1 //

śrīśrīnivāsadāsena natvā veṅkaṭadeśikaṃ //

kevalādvaitarihādinīyaṃ viracyate // 2 //
oṃ anugātajanapālaḥ krūrabhūpālakāla - /

pūrṇasyāvāhanaṃ kutra sarvādhārasya cāsanaṃ svacchasya pādyamardhyaṃ ca śuddhasyācamanaṃ kutaḥ // 1 //

nirmalasya kutaḥ snānaṃ etc.

gaṇeśo 'yaṃ lokaḥ sa namati gaṇeśaṃ matikṛte

gaṇeśenodīrṇaḥ spṛhayatu gaṇeśāya satataṃ /

yadīkṣā jagadutpattisthitisaṃhārakāraṇaṃ /

yadātmakam idaṃ vande śrīrāmaṃ taṃ patañjaliṃ //

jñānendrāparanāmānaṃ dakṣiṇāmūtir daivataṃ /

vāsudevādi sacchiṣyaṃ namāmi paramaṃ gurum //

śrījñānendrakṛpāpātraṃ kṛtsnatantravivecanaṃ /

śrīmadgaṇṭanṛsiṃhākhyasūriṃ saṃkalaye gurum //

natvā gurūn nayasmatrūn (?) dvādaśāhejyasūnunā /

vivicyate 'gnihotreṇa ṭīkā tatvavivecanī //

yadāliṅgyeti /

nṛharim iti vigrahaviśeṣopahitatveṣṭadevatāvācakapadena jagatkāraṇaṃ brahma lakṣayati / etc.

namo vedāntavedyāya brahmaṇe 'nantarūpiṇe //1//

mumukṣūṇām apekśyo 'yam ātmabodho 'bhidhīyate // 3 // etc.

śrīrāmaṃ paramānandaṃ etc.

Com.-fol. 1b:

śrīgaṇeśāya namaḥ śrīsarasvatyai namaḥ

namaḥ paramaśāntāya parānandavilāsine /

nityānandaniketāya rukmiṇīpataye namaḥ //1//

jagadaṅkurakandāya kandarpapraśamātmane /

nitambanyastahastāya viṭṭhalāya namos tu te //2//

bhaje 'haṃ karūṇāmūrttiṃ maṅgalāyatanaṃ hariṃ /

nityānandam agādhaṃ taṃ nityado 'bhīṣṭasiddhaye //3//

nirmathya vedodadhitaś ca yena yaḥ samuddhṛtaḥ saṃsṛtiśāntiśevadhiḥ /

namāmy ahaṃ taṃ jagatāṃ guruṃ yatiṃ śrīśaṅkaraṃ sajjanasevyapādukaṃ //4//

nityānandaguruṃ natvā satkṛtvā sakalāgamān smṛtvātha sakalān sādhūn kriyate harikīrttanam //5//

śrīvatsacinhamiśrebhyo nama uktimadhīmahi

yaduktayastrayīkaṇṭhe yānti maṅgalasūtratāṃ //1//

raghuvara yadadhūryorañjayan mañjuvākyair

atimanujasuvaktādveśaśīlaikmūlaiḥ

atha tanutim udārāmātmasaṃjīvanārthaṃ

satatam aham upāse taṃ guruṃ kūranāthaṃ //2//

atimānuṣaśīlavattaveṣai — rativattāmaravikramapratāpaiḥ

atilaṅghitasarvalokasāmyaṃ varaye vaiṣṇavavaibhāvatāraṃ //3//

fol. 1b: 

hariharasarasvatī yadgururīḍyaḥ paramahaṃsānāṃ /

aitareyeṇa saṃproktā dvitīyāraṇyakāntagā //

brahmavidyā suvispaṣṭaṃ bālabodhāya varṇyate // 1 //

ātmaiva sṛṣṭeḥ prāgāsīn nāmarūpavivarjitaḥ //

so 'py eka eva nānyosti jaḍaṃ cānyaṃ na vidyate // 2 //

māyāṃ tu prakṛtiṃ vidyānmāyinaṃ tu maheśvaraṃ //

iti śrutyantare proktā māyā nānyātra tatvataḥ // 3 // etc.
śrīhariṃ paramānandam upadeṣṭāram īśvaraṃ // etc.

natvā vedāntasiddhāntakusumārāmamaṇḍanaṃ //

kutarkakaṇṭakoddhāraṃ nirmame budhamodadaṃ //2//

śriyaḥ kamitur ānamya caraṇāṃburuhaddhyaṃ //

yathābodhaṃ vidhāsyāmaḥ kathālakṣaṇapañcikāṃ //1/

kīrṇecandanacampakaprabhṛtibhiḥ kvalpaṃ sukhaṃ jāgare /

mithyātvena samanvite paricite svapne 'pi saukhyaṃ kutaḥ //

mūḍhatvena hataṃ suṣuptam iti sā viśleṣaṇī yācate /

śaṃbho vallabhasaṅgamotsavamayī syān me turīyā daśā //1//

Begins: fol. 1b

Comm:

śuklāmbaradharaṃ viṣṇuṃ śāśivarṇaṃ caturbhujaṃ /

prasannavadanaṃ dhyāyet sarvavighnopaśāntaye /1/

yasya smaraṇamātreṇa vighnā dūraṃ prayānti hi /

vande 'haṃ dantivaktraṃ taṃ vāñchitārthapradāyakaṃ /2/

natvā śrībhāratītīrthavidyāraṇyamunīśvarau /

kriyate citradīpasya vyākhyā tātparyabodhinī /3/ etc.

fol. 1b

bhaktabhāvasvarūpāya tanmārgavyañjakāya ca //

taddānāyāttadīkṣāya svācāryaprabhave namaḥ // 1 //

virāgād indriyāṇāṃ vai nirodhe sati sādhaneḥ //

yamādibhiś ca vijñāne jñāne bhavati satphalam // 2 //

tadabhāvena sarveṣu prākṛtāṃrśa(śa)nivṛttitaḥ //

bhaktimārge kathaṃ sākṣātphalaṃ bhavati tatvataḥ // 3 //

niḥsādhanāṅgīkṛtasya syātphalaṃ rodhato yathā //

tadarthasādhanaṃ rūpaṃ tasya svādhvanivarṇyate // 4 //etc.

fol. 1b

namāmi śrīmadācāryān analpakaruṇāyutān //

nirodhaphaladānāya prabhuṇā prakaṭīkṛtān // 1 //

yadīyacaraṇāmbhojacaraṇaṃ mūrttimat prabhoḥ //

tatkṛpāto nirūpye 'haṃ nirodhavivṛtiṃ mudā // 2 //

tadāvirbhāvitaśrīmatprabhusevārasātmakaḥ //

asmatprabhuḥ kṛpayatu priyaḥ śrīviṭhṭhaleśvaraḥ // 3 //

vande pitṛpadāmbhojaṃ śrīmadācāryasaṃśritaḥ //

yato 'ham abhavaṃ sarvasādhanābhāvavān api // 4 //

fol. 1a

manovuddhihaṅkāracittāni nāhaṃ //

na śrotraṃ na jihvā na ca ghrāṇanetram //

na cāvyomabhūmir na tejo na vāyuḥ //

cidānanrūpaṃ śivo 'haṃ śivo 'haṃ // 1 // etc.

fol. 5b

vātsalyād abhayapradānasamayād ārttārttinirvāpaṇād /

audāryād apaśoṣaṇād agaṇitaḥ śreyaḥ padaḥ prāpaṇāt //

sevyaḥ śrīpatir eka eva jagatām ete sadā sākṣiṇaḥ /

pralhādāś ca vibhīṣaṇaś ca kavirāḍ pāñcālyahalyā dhruvaḥ // 1 // etc.

fol. 1a

māyollāsāḥ kśarā ye hariharavidhayo yaś ca māyāśrayo 'nya-/

s teṣām īśo mahātmā kṣara iti gadito 'śeṣaviṣṇvādi vandyaḥ //

tasyāpīśaś cidātmā viharati parayā līlayā yaḥ sakhībhi-/

r dhāmni śvetaṃ kiśoraṃ nirupamaramaṇaṃ cākṣarātītam īḍe // 1//

prauḍhājñānavināśanaikacaturāṃ satpremalakṣāṃ citāṃ /

dhāmoddāmavivecanaikajananīṃ sattāratamyānvitām //

yo 'ddhāchrīyutachatraśāladhāraṇīpālāya vidyāṃ parāṃ /

taṃ vande munivṛndavanditapadaṃ śrīprāṇanāthābhidhaṃ // 2 //

kalau prādurbhūto ya iha karuṇākalpitatanuḥ /

svavāṇībhir māyāvaraṇavinipātāya jagatāṃ //

paraḥ śuddho buddho nigamagadito dhāmanilayo /

harīśadyair vandyo jayati sa sakhīprāṇaramaṇaḥ // 3 //

tāratamyam avagamya puṇyataḥ prāṇanāthaparamānukampayā //

santanomi nigamārthadīpanaṃ tatvataḥ paramahaṃsatuṣṭathe // 4 //

abodhād anyathā nītaḥ śrutyartho bahudhā budhaiḥ //

prāṇanāthopadeśena sa yathārthī nigadyate // 5 // etc.

fol. 1b

oṃ vṛndādevīṃ namaskṛtya rādhikāṃ ca hariṃ gurum /

suvodhāya satāṃ bakṣye niṃbārkkatattvanirṇayam // 1 //

niṃbārkko 'haṃ sa evātra śrīmannārāyaṇaḥ svayam /

bhaktābhilāṣavarṣitvasyānyatrānupapattitaḥ // 2 //

sarvābhilāṣasekārthānnivisecana ityataḥ /

dhātor iti vadantyeke padavākyapramāṇagāḥ // 3 // etc.

fol. 1b

namāmi śrīmadācāryān analpakaruṇāyutān // etc.

fol. 1b

namāmi śrīmadācāryān analpakaruṇāyutān // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 112-1871-72
column5:
fol. 1b

abhavad atirasālaṃ jihma vidyujjaṭālam

pralayajaladajālaṃ yatkṛpālaṅkṛteṣu //

śiśiramukhamayūkhair bhaktasantāpahāra

sa vibuir akhilakālaṃ madṛśāṃ gocaro 'stu //1//

namāmi śrīmadācāryān prabhūn śrīviṭhṭhaleśvarān /

yadṛśau karuṇāpūrṇe mādṛśāṃ sarvasiddhide //2//

tatputrān saha sūnubhir nijagurūn śrīkṛṣṇacandrākayān /

bhaktyā namya pitāmahaṃ yadupatiṃ tātaṃ ca pītāmbaraṃ //

saṃvīkṣyopaniṣatkṛtismṛtigaṇaṃ bhāṣyāṇi sūtrāṇy api /

prasthānair vividhair yutāny atha mayā vādāvalī tanyate //3//

ye tattvadīpabhāṣyaprabhṛtisaukṣmyeṇa susthitā vādāḥ /

yadyetān avatārya prakaṭīkurve 'tra yuktimadvākyaiḥ //4//

śrutiśirasi yasya mahimā nirupadhir īśo 'pi yasya khalu mahimā /

taṃ kṛṣṇam ādimūrttiṃ namāmi niravadya sadguṇaṃ brahma //5//

fol. 1b

namo nava ghanaśyāma kāmakāmitadehino /

kamalākāmasaudāmakaṇakāmukagehine // 

śrīnārāyaṇatīrthānāṃ gurūṇāṃ caraṇasmṛtiḥ /

bhūyān me sādhikeṣṭānāṃ maniṣṭānāṃ ca vādhikā //

advaitasiddhivyākhyānaṃ brahmānandena bhikṣuṇā /

saṃkṣiptacandrikārthena kriyate laghucandrikā // 96 //

column5:

praṇamadamaramaulī prasphuradratnaraśmī

fol. 1b

śrīmadānandatīrthāryavallabhaṃ param akṣaram // 1 //

sasarja bhagavān ādau trīn guṇān prakṛteḥ paraḥ /

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 130-1871-72
column5:
fol. 1b

vande śrīkṛṣṇadevaṃ muranarakabhidaṃ vedavedāntavedyam

loke bhaktiprasidhdyai yadukulajaladhau prādurāsīd apāraḥ /

yasyāsīd rūpam eva tribhuvanataraṇe bhaktivac ca svatantram

śāstraṃ rūpaṃ ca loke prakaṭayati mudā yaḥ sa no bhūtihetuḥ //1// etc.

 

...

 

śrīmadvallabhavidvadīśavilasadvaṃśābdhipūrṇendave

śrīgopīpativandine sumanase brahmāmṛtasyandine /

śrīmallakṣmaṇabhaṭṭasūrir iti yannāmākhilābhīṣṭadam

tasmai tāta mahāśayāya haraye kurmo namaḥ siddhaye //3// etc.

oṃ paraṃ parasthaṃ gahanād anādim ekaṃ niviṣṭaṃ bahudhā guhāṃsu/

ādhārakārikābhis taṃ gurur abhibhāṣate sma tatsāram /

kathayaty abhinavaguptaḥ śivaśāsanadṛṣṭiyogena //3//

nijaśaktivaibhavabharā daṇḍacatuṣṭayam idaṃ vibhāgena /

śaktir māyā prakṛtiḥ pṛthvī ceti prabhāvitaṃ prabhunā //4//

mālā phaṇī vacani mīlati yatprabodhāt 

tat brahma naumi sukham advayam ātmarūpam // 1 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 264-1882-83
column5:
beg. fol. 4

Text: namaḥ śrīśaṅkarānandagurupādāṃbujanmane /

savilāsamahā...saikakarmaṇi //1// etc.

Comm:

śrībhāratītīrthavidyāraṇyamunīśvarau /

pratyaktattvavivekasya kriyate padadīpikā // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 265-1882-83
column5:
Begins fol. 2a

Text: 

akhaṇḍaṃ saccidāndam avāṅmanasagocaram /

ātmānam akhilādhāram āśraye 'bhīṣṭacintaye // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 265-1882-83
column5:
fol. 2a

Comm:

kṛṣṇānandaṃ guruṃ natvā paramānandam advayam /

vakṣye vedāntasārasya ṭikāṃ nāmnāṃ subodhinīm // 1 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 266-1882-83
column5:
Begins fol.2a

tām yasmin pravṛttā bhṛśaviśadadhiyaḥ saṃśraye taṃ girīśam //3//

bhindānamenāṃsi durāsadāni pratyūhavargaprasavāni tāni /

rājānam ādyātaparaṃ parānābhārād upāse girijābhijātam //4// etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 266-1892-95
column5:
fol. 1b 

prodyachākhamahāvaṭadrumataṭe yogāsanasthaṃ prabhum //

pratyak tatvabubhukṣubhiḥ pratidinaṃ prodvīkṣyamāṇānanam //

mudrāṃ tarkamayīṃ dadhānam amalaṃ karpūragauraṃ śivam //

hṛdyantaḥkalaye sphurantam aniśaṃ śrīdakṣināmūrttikam // 1 //

natvātha śaṅkarācāryamukhyān sarvān garīyasaḥ //

mānasollāsavarttāntaṃ varṇayāmi yathāmati // 2 //

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 267-1882-83
column5:
fol. 1b

yasyāhur āgamacidaḥ paripūrṇaśakter

aṃśe kiyatpayiniviṣṭam amuṃ prapañcam /

tasmai tamālarucibhāsurakandharāya 

nārāyaṇīsahacarāya namaḥ śivāya // 1 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 267-1892-95
column5:
fol. 1b

śrīrāmākhyaṃ paraṃ brahma jagatkāraṇakāraṇam //

yadacintyamahāśaktisaccidānandavigraham // 1 //

premādhīnaṃ kṛpāpūrṇaṃ nityaṃ nityaguṇālayam //

tannāmāni pravakṣyāmi tadārādhanasiddhaye // 2 //

jānakīvallabhaḥ śrīmān raghuvaṃśaśiromaṇiḥ //

pitṛpuṇyaphalaḥ sūraḥ kauśalyānandavarddhanaḥ // 3 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 269-1892-95
column5:
fol. 1b

viśvañcarī kīrttivibhusvalīlayā tathāvarī bhartyakhilaṃ sanātanaḥ /

yaḥ sañjarī harttikalāntavigrahas taṃ sarvabhūtāśrayam ānatomy aham //1//

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 270-1882-83
column5:
fol. 1b

ye muktāv api niḥspṛhāḥ pratipadapronmīladānandadām /

yām āsthāya samastamastakamaṇiṃ kurvanti yaṃ sve vaśe //

tān bhaktān api tāṃ ca bhaktim api taṃ bhaktapriyaṃ śrīharim /

vande santatam arthaye 'nudivasaṃ nityaṃ śaraṇyaṃ bhaje //1//

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 271-1882-83
column5:
fol. 1b

ye muktāv api niḥspṛhāḥ pratipadapronmīladānandadām etc.

column5:

natvā pitṛpadāmbhojaṃ sarvābhīṣṭapradāyakam /

kṛṣṇa vāṅmūlakācāryavaco vyākhyātum udyataḥ //1// etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 272-1891-95
column5:
fol. 1a

namo bhaktabhayābhāvabhāvine bhaktidāyine /

śrīmadagnikumārāya pārāvārāya sakṣateḥ //1//

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 273-1882-83
column5:
fol. 1b

yatpādābjaśrayādāsan sarve pūrṇamanorathā /

tam eva gokulādhīśaṃ sarvasiddhai samāśraye // 1 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 273-1884-87
column5:
fol. 1b

śuklāmbaradharaṃ viṣṇuṃ śaśivarṇaṃ caturbhujam /

prasannavadanaṃ dhyāyet sarvavighnopaśāntaye // 1 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 273-1891-95
column5:
fol. 1b

atha śrīvallabhācāryadhyānam atra nirūpyate /

nivārya sarvasandehāṃs tatsvarūpe kṛpābalāt //1//

vrajasrīhṛdayaṃ kṛṣṇa viyogabharabhāvitaṃ /

vrajastriyo 'pi virahabhāvaprāptaphalās tathā //2// etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 274-1882-83
column5:
fol. 1b

natvā śrīvallabhācāryān śrīkṛṣṇasya svarūpiṇaḥ /

tatsamarpaṇagadyārthaṃ varṇayāmi yathāmatiḥ // 1 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 274-1892-95
column5:
fol. 1b

aṃhaḥ saṃharad akhilaṃ sakṛd udayād eva sakalalokasya /

taraṇir iva timirajaladhiṃ jayati jaganmaṅgalaṃ harer nāma //1//

kāruṇyāmṛtanirjharaḥ surasarijjanmākaraḥ śrīvadhū-

līlābjaṃ vrajakāminīkucataṭīkastūrikāsthāsakaḥ /

uttaṃsaḥ surayoṣitāṃ munimano vaśyauṣadhīpallavo /

yasyāṅghriḥ suravallabhaḥ sa jayati śrīpuṇḍarīkapriyaḥ //2// etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 278-1892-95
column5:
fol. 1b

Comm:

lakṣmīkāntaṃ namaskṛtya yathāmati viracyate /

vāsiṣṭasāravivṛtiḥ paropakṛtaye mayā // 1 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 279-1879-80
column5:
fol. 1b

namaḥ śrīkṛṣṇapādābjatalakuṅkumapaṅkayoḥ 

ruce yadaruṇaṃ śaśvanmāmakaṃ hṛdayāmbujam // 1 //

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 281-1892-95
column5:
fol. 1b

tato jaganmaṅgalāmaṅgalātmanā vidhāya rāmāyaṇakīrttim uttamām /

cacāra pūrvācaritaṃ raghūttamo rājarṣivaryair api sevitaṃ tathā // 1 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 281-1892-95
column5:
fol. 1b

gaṇeśaṃ kamalānāthaṃ praṇipatya guroḥ padam /

kariṣye rāmagītāyā vyākhyānāṃ(naṃ) bālabuddhaye // 1 // etc.

Text: oṃ namaḥ śaṅkarānandagurupādāmbujanmane / etc.

column5:

tapoyajñadānādibhiḥ śuddhabuddhivirakto gajādeḥ padetucchavudyā //

parityajya sarvaṃ yad āpnoti tatvaṃ paraṃ brahmanityaṃ tad evāham asmi // 1 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 282-A-1879-80

fol. 1b

oṃ praṇamya paramānandaṃ mohāndhatimirāpaham /

tatprasādabalenaiva kriyate bālabodhinī //1//

yasya smaraṇamātreṇa kṣīyante bhavabhītayaḥ /

taṃ sarvasākṣiṇaṃ yāmi śaraṇaṃ kṛpaṇo hy aham //2//

saccidānandam ātmānam advayākhaṇḍam acyutam //

dhyātvā praśnāvalī samyak krīyate mokṣasiddhaye //1//

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 285-1895-1902
column5:
yadbhāsā nikhilaṃ vibhāti viṣayo yo na svayaṃ jyotiṣām //

yasyāhur bhuvanodbhavanilayāllīlā (lost) sūrayaḥ //

pañcāṅgovara māmananti manasāṃ vācāṃ ca viśvātmane /

tasmai śuddha sukhā dvītīyavapuṣe śaśvannamo (lost) // 1 //

nivandhapuṇyajālāni samālocya prayatnataḥ //

sanyāyamakarandānāṃ saṅgrahaḥ kriyate mayā // 2 // (lost)

guroḥ kṛpāḷoḥ kṛpayā sadaiṣā viśveśapādāmbujadīrghanaukā //1// etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 286(a)-1895-98
column5:
Begins fol. 1b

Text:

kaḥ khalu nākriyate iṣṭā(?)dṛṣṭārthasādhanapaṭṭīyān /

kaṇṭhasthitāyā vimalo praśnottararatnamālikayā //1// etc.

 

Comm:

śrīmate rāmānujāya namaḥ / śrīgurucaraṇakamalebhyo namaḥ /

atha saṃkrāccārjajī praśnotrajñānaratnamālā liṣyate //

doha / śrīguruturasīdās ke vandata caraṇ anūp /

rāmdās tin caraṇraj baraṇat bhāṣārūp // etc.

column5:
Begins fol. 2a

dadau bādarāyaṇaḥ // 5 //

uktaṃ ca tena kasmaicin na dātavyam idaṃ tvayā /

sūtaputrān yathā devāḥ kṣubhyanti ca śapanti ca // 6 //

atha praṣṭho mayā vipro bhagavān bādarāyaṇaḥ / 

bhagavan devatāḥ sarvāḥ kiṃ kṣubhyanti śapanti ca // 7 // etc.

kvacitkvacidvivaraṇe gūḍho bhāvaḥ prakāśyate //3//

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 324-1884-86

fol. 1b

śrīrādhāramaṇaṃ vivāhakathanollāsaṃ jananyāḥ puro /

baddholūṣalanandamocitam ahaṃ keśītanudbhedinam //

istīprāṇaharaṃ ca sampadimanaṃ svāsye jagaddhāriṇam /

añcūdbhedakarambakasya pilarauvakṣaṃ tamīśaṃ bhaje //1//

ādau sā prakṛtis tato mahad ahaṃ khaṃ vātatejo 'nalam

bhūmer auṣadhayo 'nnadehajananaṃ kṛcchraṃ kramāj jāyate /

yasmād udbhavanaṃ bhaven nilayanaṃ tatraiva cadrak-layo

yasmāt śrīpuruṣottamād bhavati vai tasmai namaḥ śarmaṇe //2//

patir gatiś cāndhakavṛṣnisātvatāṃ prasīdatāṃ me bhagavān satāṃ gatiḥ // 1 //

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 326-1899-1915

jagajjanmasyemapralayaracanāśīlavapuṣe /

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 327-1887-91
column5:
fol. 1b

akhaṇḍaṃ saccidānandaṃ sarvendriyādigocaram /

bhaktavatsalabhakteśam utpannaṃ draviḍeṣu yat // 1 //

rāmānujaṃ namaskṛtya marttyādiśaraṇapradam /

nārāyaṇaparo nityaṃ jīvanmuktaḥ svarūpataḥ // 2 //

oṃnamo nārāyaṇāyeti mantraḥ sarvārthasādhaka iti /

yo yatsmaret sa tadrūpo bhaved iti // tathā ca śrutiḥ //

yasya deve parābhaktir yathā deve tathā gurau /

tasyaite kathitā hyarthā prakāśante mahātmanaḥ // atha śrīnārāyaṇāya namaḥ //

column5:

nityaṃ nivasatu hṛdaye caitanyātmā murārir naḥ /

bhāṣyaṃ yasya nideśād racitaṃ vidyābhūṣaṇenedaṃ /

govindaḥ sa paramātmā mayāpi sūkṣmaṃ karotv asmin // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 335-1899-1915
column5:
fol. 1b

vande śrīmadhurāryaṃ taṃ śiṣyojjīvanahetave /

yo 'karoj janakījāner nirmalaṃ guṇadarpaṇam //1//

yebhyaḥ sarvaśiromaṇer bhagavataḥ śrīlakṣmaṇobhīharā /

rocante satataṃ sudhādhirucirāḥ kalyāṇarūpā guṇāḥ //

sevyās te sudhiyaḥ prasāditaramākāntaṃ nitāntaṃ janā /

bhaktis teṣu ca bhūyasī mama harer bhakteṣu bhūyāt sthirā //2// etc.

 

...

 

pūrttir ity ucyate sadbhiś cantyete te ubhe iha /

krapāmaṇim ayaṃ viśṇoḥ rāmānujamuner api //

dṛśyatāṃ nirmalaṃ hy etad bhagavadguṇadarpaṇam //7//

yenekṣate śṛṇotīdaṃ jighrati vyākaroti ca //

svādvasādū vijānāti tadprajñānam udīritam // 1 //

buddheḥ sākṣitayā sthitvā sphurann aham itīryate // 3 //

asmītyaikyaparāmarśas tena brahma bhavāmy aham // 4 //

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 350-A-1895-1902
column5:
fol. 1a

pāpaughaḥ paridhūyatāṃ bhavasukhe doṣo 'nusandhīyatā-

m ātmecchā vyavasīyatāṃ nijagṛhāt tūrṇaṃ vinirgamyatām // 1 //

fol. 1b:

savilāsamahāmohagrāhagrāsaikakarmaṇe //2// etc.

column5:

āśubodhāya śiṣyāṇāṃ ṛjubhāṣyārthasaṅgraham /

siddhalekhākhyayā vṛttyā bhāṣyakṛt kurute 'lpayā //2// etc.

tasmai tamālarucibhāsurakandharāya nārāyaṇīsahacarāya namaḥ śivāya // 1 // etc.

anirvācyā vidyā etc. as in no. 565

yat jñānāj jīvato muktir utkrāntigativarjitā /

āvṛttir asakṛd apadeśāt / asādhanaṃ nirūpyaphalaṃ nirūpyata ity adhyāyayor hetuphalabhāvaṃ saṅgatim āha tatīya iti / etc.

column5:
fol. 1b

sanatkumārapramukhā nirīhā namo 'stu tebhyo bhagavatpriyebhyaḥ //1//

haste 'kṣamālā hṛdi rāmanāma māle viśāle nayanendulekhe /

yanmastake keśavapādatoyam īśaṃ paraṃ bhāgavataṃ namāmi //2//

anāmarūpāya nirāśrayāya vedāntarūpāya guṇātigāya /

namas turīyāya sadoditāya kasmai cidānandasukhāya tasmai //3// etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 637-1884-87
column5:
fol. 1b

Text:

adṛṣṭadvayam ānandam ātmānaṃ jyotir avyayam /

viniśrutya śruteḥ sākṣād yuktis tatrābhidhīyate //

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 637-1884-87
column5:
fol. 1b

Comm.:

tatrādau maṅgalaṃ tatvasmaraṇarūpaṃ sūcayann abhidheyaprayojane sākṣātpratipādyakarttavyaṃ pratijānīte / etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 637-A-1886-90
column5:
fol. 1b

rādhārādhāramaṇau nikuñjakelipriyau natvā /

kriyante bhaktirahasyaṃ tadubhayadasevinā prītyai //1//

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 637-B-1886-92
column5:
fol. 30a

…(lost) yadbhṛkuṭīnaṭīvinipuṇā yadbālabhūraṅgabhūn-

madyācāryaka-cāturīṃ racayati premādhisambarddhinī //

yatpādāmbujaṣatpadīkṛtaśiraḥ śyāmaḥ prasādecchayā 

sā śrīkuñcabihāriṇī vijayate sarvopari preyasī // 1 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 638-1884-87
column5:
fol. 1b

viśveśaṃ ḍhuṇḍhirājaṃ jagadudayakṛtaṃ śāradāṃ sūtrakāram /

vyāsaṃ cācāryavaryaṃ tribhuvanaviditaṃ śaṅkaraṃ bhāṣyakāram /

ānandāntaprakāśānubhavayadapadaṃ sadguruṃ śrīnṛsiṃham 

vande vidyānidhānaṃ śamadam anirataṃ rāghavendraṃ yatīndram

yacchiṣyaśiṣyasandohavyāptā bhāratabhūmayaḥ /

vande taṃ yatibhir vandyaṃ prakāśānandam īśvaram //

siddhāntamauktikaśreṇiprakāśāya pradīpikā /

kriyate parapakṣaughadhvāntadhvaṃsapravarttinī //

śiṣṭācāraprāptamaṅgalam ācarann nirūpaṇīyaṃ pratijānīte // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 639-1886-92
column5:
fol. 1b

ye muktāv api nispṛhāḥ pratipada etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 640-1884-87
column5:
fol. 1a

śrīśaṅkarācāryanavāvatāraṃ viśveśvaraṃ viśvaguruṃ praṇamya /

vedāntaśāstraśravaṇālasānāṃ bodhāya kurve kam api prayatnam // 1 //

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 644-1884-87
column5:
fol. 1b

śrīgurucaraṇadvandvaṃ vande 'haṃ mathitaduḥsahadvandvam /

bhrāntigrahopaśāntiṃ pāṃsumayaṃ yasya bhasitam ātanute // 1 //

daiśikavaraṃ dayāluṃ vande 'haṃ nihitasakalasandeham /

yaccaraṇadvayam advayam anubhavam upadiśati tatpadasyārtham // 2 //

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 644-1886-92
column5:
fol. 1b 

yatpādābjāśrayādāsan sarve pūrṇamanorathā /

tam eva gokulādhīśaṃ sarvasidhdyai samāśraye // 1 //

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 646-A-1884-87
column5:
fol. 1b

śrīguruśrīpadāmbhojamakarandaṃ śivaṃ mudā /

pāyaṃ pāyaṃ kāśikāyāṃ ko 'pi haṃso virājate // 1 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 646-B-1884-87
column5:
fol. 5b

satyajñānānandatīrthavāsī haṃsaḥ surasāravit /

amalaṃ kamalaṃ prītyā kamalāpataye 'rpayat // 1 //

devavidāś ca munayo gāyaṃ gāyaṃ namanti yam /

smāraṃ smāraṃ tam ātmānaṃ pravaktuṃ ca manodadhe // 2 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 646-C-1884-87
column5:
fol. 11b

haṃsā ye rasikapremṇā samartha kamalaṃ sa te /

vivekenaiva yatprāptaṃ paraṃ tad brūhi tattvataḥ // 1 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 647-1887-91
column5:
fol. 1b

adhigatabhidāpūrvācāryān upetya sahasradhā

sarid iva mahībhedān samprāpya śauripadodgatā /

jayati bhagavatpādaśrīmanmukhāmbujanirgatā

jananaharaṇī suktir brahmādvayaikaparāyaṇā // 1 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 650-1886-92
column5:
fol. 1b

śrīkṛṣṇadevamukhapadmamarandapūrṇa-

vākyānuvādavinivāritajīvadoṣam /

ācāryavaryacaraṇau hṛdaye nidhāya

natvā ca vas taduditaṃ vivṛṇoti dāsaḥ // 1 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 652-1887-91
column5:
fol. 1b

apārasaṃsārasamudramadhye nimajjato me śaraṇaṃ kim asti /

guro kṛpālo kṛpayāvadaitad viśveśapādāmbujadīrghanaukā //1// etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 654-1884-87
column5:
fol. 1b

yatpadāmbhoruhadhyānānandanirvṛtacetasaḥ /

muktim apy avajānanti taṃ vande puruṣottamam /

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 655-1884-87
column5:
fol. 1b

jayati vijayaśīlo rāmacandro dayālur

nigamavibhavapāras tatvasiddhāntaniṣṭaḥ //

pavanatanayavandyo jānakīvallabho 'sau

raghujasahasujāpyo bhṛtyarakṣaikadīkṣyaḥ // 1 //

śrīnārāyaṇapādapaṅkajarajo brahmādibhir vanditam /

vande śrījagadīśaśeṣasahitaṃ nīlācale vāsinam //

līlālokaparaṃ sadā svavibhavaṃ bhogaikacitram param //

yasyaiveṣṭasadātanaṃ hi sukaraṃ dāsaika(...) param // 2 //

śrīsītāpatidevavanditaparaṃ rāmaṃ hi rāmānujam //

śrīkāntenasahārya veṅkaṭapatiṃ śrīrāmabhaktaṃ harim //

śrīśāṇḍilyakulodbhavaṃ ca pitaraṃ dāmodaraṃ mohanam //

tān ānamya karomi bhūṣaṇasubhaṃ dāsānudāso hy aham // 3 //

padyarītiṃ na jānāmi nāhaṃ kavir na paṇḍitaḥ //

śrīnivāsaprasādena karomi bhāṣyabhūṣaṇam // 4 // etc

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 655-1884-87
column5:
fol. 2a

Comm.

vede śāstreṣu vācyaṃ bhuvanahitachalaṃ rāmarūpaṃ sasītām //

saṃsevyaṃ śeṣarūpair anubhavavibhavaṃ vāyusūnor upāsyam //

natvā natvā suveśaṃ niravadhikarasaṃ vaibhavaṃ bhūṣaṇākhyam //

bhāṣābhāṣyaṃ sucetaṃ racitasukhacitaṃ dodhakaṃ nirmayiṣye //

tathā ca //

jaya jaya sītākantaparabrahmavyāpakasakala

savanāmī bhagavanta rāma sahaja jayakaraṇavapu // 1 // etc

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 655-A-1887-91
column5:
fol. 1b

Comm:

svājñānodbhūtabhūtapramukhavahumukhadvaitadehadvayodyān-

mātṛtvādiprapañcapracayaparicayaprāptasaṃsārayantram /

netyanyāsaprasūtapravaṇamativalaprāstamehaprabhāva-

protthapratyarthisārthadyutikathamakathaṃ dhāma kāmaṃ prapadye // 1 // etc.

sampradāyavidām uktir anusṛtya praṇīyate //

śāstraprakāśikā seyaṃ sureśvaravaco 'nugā // 11//

iha khalu ... etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 655-A-1887-91
column5:
fol. 2a

Text:

svāvidyāvibhavaprasūtavipuladvaitaprapañcāhita-

spaṣṭabhrāntitirohitātmamatayo yaṃ bhāgaśo manvate /

nirbhāgaṃ sakalābhidhānamananavyāpāradūrasthitaṃ

vande nanditaviśvam avyayam ajaṃ bhaktyā tam ekaṃ vibhum // 1 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 656-1884-87
column5:
fol. 1b

oṃ śrīvyaṅkaṭeśaṃ kariśailanāthaṃ śrīdevarājaṃ ghaṭikādrisiṃham /

kṛṣṇena na ravāṃ(sā)kaṃpati rājam īḍe svapne ca dṛṣṭān mama deśikendrān // 1 // etc.

yatīśvaraṃ praṇamyāhaṃ vedācāryaṃ mahāgurum /

karomi bālabodhārthaṃ yatīndramatadīpikā // 2 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 657-1884-87
column5:
fol. 1b

śrīveṅkaṭeśaṃ kariśailanātham etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 659-1884-87
column5:
fol. 1b

śrīmadveṅkaṭanāthāryaḥ kavitārkikakeśarī /

vedāntācāryavaryo me sannidhattāṃ sadā hṛdi // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 659-1887-91
column5:
fol. 1b

yaṃ hi vairāgyasampannās tattvam arthavivekinaḥ /

labhante sādhanair dānttās taṃ sītānāyakaṃ bhaje //

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 659-A-1882-83
column5:
fol. 1b:

comm:

natvā śrībhāratītīrthavidyāraṇyamunīśvarau //etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 660-1884-87
column5:
fol. 1b

aśeṣacidacidvastuśeṣiṇe śeṣaśāyine /

nirmalānantakalyāṇanidhaye viṣṇave namaḥ // 1 //

paraṃ brahmaivājñaṃ bhramaparigataṃ saṃsarati tat 

paropādhyālīḍhaṃ vivaśam aśubhayāsyadam iti /

śrutinyāyāpetaṃ jagati vitataṃ mohanam idam

tamo yenāpāstaṃ sa hi vijayate yāmunamuniḥ // 2 //

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 660-1887-91
column5:
fol. 1b

bhagavatpādabhāṣyārtham ālocyātiprayatnataḥ /

prāyaḥ pratyakṣaram kurve gītāgūḍhārthadīpikām //

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 661-1887-91
column5:
fol. 1b

śrīkṛṣṇacaraṇadvandvanavecandramarīcayaḥ /

virājante mokṣalakṣmīr yatprasādāt samīyate // 1 //

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 662-1884-87
column5:
fol. 1b

natvā viśvodayasthe malayahetuṃ patiṃ śriyaḥ / etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 663 A-1887-91
column5:
fol. 1b

Text:

vāramābhi brahmavid brahma bhāti svapna ivānyani /

yad idaṃ tatsvaśabdotthairyo yadvetti sa cettu tat // 1 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 663 A-1887-91
column5:
fol. 1b

Comm.

satyaṃ jñānam anantam ekam ajavaṃ nityaṃ vibhuṃ śāśvatam 

pratyagbrahmarasāyanaṃ sukhavanaṃ pūrṇaṃ paraṃ pāvanam /

svātmajyotir anādimadhyanidhanaṃ māyāvilāsair muhur

viśvākāram apāstamāyam abhayaṃ vande viśuddhaṃ padam // 1 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 663 C-1887-91
column5:
Begins fol. 2b

Text:

yataḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni prati bhānti sthitāni ca /

yatraivopaśamaṃ yānti tasmai satyātmane namaḥ // 1 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 663 C-1887-91
column5:
fol. 1b

Comm: 

oṃ brahmaṇe vratma vidbhyo vratmavidyāsampradāyakartṛbhyo vasiṣṭaviśvāmitravyāsavālmīkiśukādibhyaḥ śrīrāmacandrāya ca / oṃ ajam ajaram anādy anantam antarnijasukhabodhasadadvitīyapūrṇaṃ śivam akhila hṛdi sphurat svamāyā vikasitaviśvavilāsam ānatāḥ smaḥ // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 663 D-1887-91
column5:
fol. 1b

Comm:

sadabhayanijapūrṇānandasaṃvitpratiṣṭam

yad iha nijamahis tā viśvarūpāṇi vibrat /

viharati ca vimohāt teṣu nānātmabudhyā

śrutividita sa tattvaṃ tatparabrahma vande // 1 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 663 E-1887-91
column5:
fol. 1b

Comm:

bhuvanaracanapālavopaśāntiprathitamahāvibhavasvabhāvapūrṇam

vigamahṛdayasākṣiniṣprapañcaṃ nijamukhabodhanaṃ śivaṃ prapadye // 1 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 663 F-1887-91
column5:
fol. 1b

Comm:

śivabhayam anādyanantamadhyaṃ paramasukhādvayabodhamātrasāram /

uparatasakalabhramaṃ viśuddhaṃ nijamahasā sphuradātmatattvam īḍe etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 663-1882-83
column5:
fol. 1b

yadavidyāvilāsena bhūtabhauktika sṛṣṭayaḥ / 

taṃ naumi paramātmānaṃ saccidānandavigraham // 1 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 663-1884-87
column5:
fol. 1b

jayati śrīgovindo gopīnātha sa madanagopālaḥ /

vakṣyāmi yasya kṛpayā prameyaratnāvalīṃ sūkṣmām //

bhaktyā bhāse nāpitoṣaṃ dadhāne dharmādhyakṣe viśvanistāri nāmni /

nityānandādvaitacaitanyarūpe tv etasmin nityam āstām ratir naḥ //2// etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 664-1882-83
column5:
fol. 1b

akhaṇḍaṃ saccidānandam avāṅmanasagocaram /

ātmānam akhilādhāram āśraye 'bhīṣṭasiddhaye // 1 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 664-1884-87
column5:
fol. 1b

kalyāṇaguṇapūrṇāya vallabhāya śriyaḥ sadā /

śrīmadhvadeśikeṣāya śrīnṛsiṃhāyate namaḥ // 1 //

taṃ pāṇipallavaṃ bāhuśākhaṃ sadvijasevittam /

vidyāhāsalatāpuṣpaṃ madhvakalpadrumaṃ bhaje //2 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 665-1882-83
column5:
fol. 1b

śrīśaṅkarācāryanavāvatāraṃ viśveśvaraṃ viśvaguruṃ praṇamya /

vedāntaśāstraśravaṇālasānāṃ bodhāya kurve kam api prabandham  // 1 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 665-1887-91
column5:
fol. 1b

atha ratnatrayaparīkṣākhyam aṣṭaślokīṃ saṃkṣepeṇa vyākurmaho(rmahe) /

nityaṃ nirdoṣagandhaṃ niratiśayasukhaṃ brahmacaitanyam ekam etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 668-1887-91
column5:
fol. 1b

yadavidyāvilāsena bhūtabhauktika sṛṣṭayaḥ / 

taṃ naumi paramātmānaṃ saccidānandavigraham // 1 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 670-1883-84
column5:
fol. 1b

Comm.:

nārāyaṇaṃ namaskṛtya naraṃ caiva narottamam /

devīṃ sarasvatīṃ vyāsaṃ tato jayam udīrayet // 1 //

lakṣmīkāntaṃ namaskṛtya yathāmati viracyate /

vāsiṣṭasāravivṛtiḥ paropakṛtaye mayā // 2 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 671-1883-84
column5:
fol. 1a Comm:

yam iha kāruṇikaṃ śaraṇaṃ gato 'py arisahodara āpa mahatpadam /

tam aham āśu hariṃ param āśraye janakajāṃ kamananta sukhākṛtim //1// etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 671-1887-91
column5:
fol. 1b

yasmin viśvam idaṃ vicitramamale vyāmnīva kādambinī 

sambhūtisthitināśabhāgibajanair ajñānibhir vīkṣyate /

yaṃ vedāntaviniścitātmamatayaḥ pratyak svarūpaṃ sadā 

paśyanty advayam eva saccidamalānandaṃ tam īḍe harim // 1 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 672-1883-84
column5:
fol. 1a

śrīgaṇeśaṃ namaskṛtya vedādiguhyam uttamam /

nirṇayaṃ sarvasāravyaṃ vakṣye saṃśayahārakam // 1 //

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 673-1882-83
column5:
fol. 1a

nityānityajagatdhātre nityāya jñānamūrtaye // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 673-1883-84
column5:
fol. 1a

śrīgaṇeśaṃ namaskṛtya vedādiguhyam uttamaṃ / etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 673-1887-91
column5:
fol. 1b

vidhiṃ viṣṇuṃ haraṃ māyāṃ natvā sarveśvaraṃ śivam /

brahmādikramabodhāya yatnaṃ tatprerito bruve // 1 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 674-A-1884-87
column5:
fol. 1b

yatpadaṃ vedasaṃvedyaṃ kaṭākṣenāpi vīkṣitum //

na kṣamante vimatayas tam upāse śriyaḥ patim // 1 //

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 674-B-1884-87
column5:
fol. 1b:

kupitāhiphaṇachāyāsamīkṛtyāparaṃ sukham //

sevante yatpadaṃ dhīrās taṃ bhaje vallabhaṃ śriyaḥ //

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 674-C-1884-87
column5:
fol. 1b

yadīyacaraṇāmbhojachāyām āśritya nirvṛtāḥ //

nadanti satataṃ muktāḥ saṃśraye taṃ śriyaḥ patim // 1 //

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 675-1887-91
column5:
fol. 1b

śrīgurucaraṇadvandvaṃ vande 'haṃ mathitaduḥsahadvandvam /

bhrāntigrahopaśāntiṃ pāṃsumayaṃ yasya bhasitam ātanute // 1 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 675-A-1884-87
column5:
fol. 1a

kupitāhiphaṇachāyāsamīkṛtyāparaṃ sukham /

sevante yatpadaṃ dhīrās taṃ bhaje vallabhaṃ śriyaḥ // 1// etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 675-B-1884-87
column5:
Begins: fol. 1b.

śrīvedavyāsāya namaḥ nirvighnam astu //

yadīyacaraṇāmbhojachāyām āśritya nirvṛtāḥ // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 676-1883-84
column5:
fol. 1b

ramāpatiṃ pū(lost; rṇa guṇaṃ) mukundaṃ vyāsaṃ ca vijñānasahasrabhānaṃ //

pūrṇaprabodhaṃ ca sutatvadīpaṃ kramād gurūṃś ca praṇamāmi mūrdhnā /

śrīmadānandatīrthāryamatam āśritya yatnataḥ /

kriyate kṛṣṇagītāyāṃ vivṛttiḥ sādhusaṃvide //

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 676-1884-87
column5:
fol. 1b

sukhaguṇabimbaḥ sādhudattāvalambhaḥ /

sumatijalajamodo dūṣitānyapramodaḥ //

bhuvanavitatamohadhvāntavidhvaṃsakeho /

diśatu dṛśamabhīṣṭāṃ vyāsasūryasvaniṣṭhāṃ // 1 //

pūrṇaprajñajayāryapūrvakagurūn ānamya vidyāpradān /

vedeśābhidhayogino 'pi kṛpayā teṣāṃ sudhāṭippaṇīm //

bālānāṃ tanute mitāṃ yadupatir bodhopadhī śuddhaye /

svasyāpi pravicintya sadgurumukhāt samyak śrutārthān muhuḥ // 2 //

na pāṇḍityābhimānena nābhimatsarataḥ kvacit //

yatnīyaṃ kiṃ tu dhīvāco śuddhaye mama nānyathā // 3 //

atha paramakāruṇiko jayatīrthaśrīcaraṇo

grantho 'yam api bahvartho bhāṣyaṃ cātyarthavistaram /

bahujñā eva jānanti viśeṣeṇārtham etayoḥ //

ity ācāryoktau lokānāṃ ...... etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 676-1887-91
column5:
fol. 1a

aham eva paraṃ brahma vāsudevākhyam avyayam //

iti syān niścito bhaktir baddha evānyathā bhavet // 1 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI  677-1884-87
column5:
fol. 1b.

namaḥ śrīpataye bhaktadattasvānanda (lost) //1//

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 677-1887-91
column5:
fol. 1b

gaṅgāpūrapracalitajaṭās trastabhogīndrabhītā-

m āliṅgatnīm acalatanayāṃ sasmitaṃ vīkṣamāṇaḥ /

līlāpāṅgaiḥ praṇatajanatāṃ nandayaṃś candramauli-

r mohadhvāntaṃ haratu paramānandamūrtiḥ śivo naḥ // 1 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 678-1884-87
column5:
fol. 1b.

śriyaḥ patyuḥ śrīmaccaraṇanakharatnāṃśukalikā /

jarīhartu dhvāntaṃ mama manasi bhaktyaiva kalitā //

yadā saṅgā gaṅgā kamalajanigaṅgādharanutā /

nṛṇām aṅgāsaṅgānnanu duritabhaṅgāya bhavati // 1 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 679-1884-87
column5:
fol. 1b.

nityāgaṇyabaladyutipramatisatsaukhyākhye vīryātulau

-dārya prabhāvadhīratāsusaguṇavrātātmadivyākṛtim /

santāpādisamastadoṣavidhuraṃ vedaikavedyaṃ jagaj

-janmādipradam indireśam aniśaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ naumyaham //1// etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 680-1884-87
column5:
fol.1b

nikhiḷaguṇanikāyaṃ nityanirdhūtaheyam //

śubhatamam iti meyaṃ śuddhasaukhyābhyupāyam //

sakaḷanigamageyaṃ sarvaśabdābhidheyam //

navajaḷadharakāyaṃ naumi lakṣmīsahāyam //1//

....

abhraṃmaṃ bhaṅgarahitam ajaḍaṃ vimaḷaṃ sadā /

ānandatīrtham atuḷaṃ bhaje tāpatrayāpahaṃ //3//

citraiḥ padaiś ca gambhīrair vākyair mānair akhaṇḍitaiḥ /

gurubhāvaṃ vyañjayantī bhāti śrajayatīrthavāk //4//

samutsārya tamastomaṃ sanmārgaṃ saṃprakāśya ca /

sadā viṣṇupadāsaktaṃ seve brahmaṇyabhāskaram //5//

jñānavairāgyabhaktyādikalyāṇaguṇaśālinaḥ /

lakṣmīnārāyaṇamunīn vande vidyāgurūn mama //6//

śrīmadhvaśāstradugdhābdhiṃ dhīmandhara mahībhṛtā /

āmathyo ghriyate nyāyāmṛtaṃ vibudhatṛptaye //7//

vikṣuptasaṅgrahāt kvāpi kvāpyuktasyopapādanāt /

anuktakathanāt kvāpi saphalo 'yaṃ śramo mama //8//

nanu mithyaiva viśvaṃ tathā hi tatra vipratipattiḥ // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 681-1884-87
column5:
fol. 1a.

nikhilaguṇanikāyaṃ nityanirdhūtaheyam // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 683-A-1884-87
column5:
fol. 1b: śriyaḥ sadānandaguṇaimṛtaṃ bhuje bhuje 'pyadoṣaṃ tadaśeṣaśaktibhiḥ //

viśeṣavāṇī mitam ātmano mudāmudāram īśaṃ priyaballavaṃ numaḥ // 1 //

sādhuprasādhitaguṇopaniṣatsakhībhi sūtragrahānusṛtakañcukivāci dakṣā /

vaṃśāgragāpi jayavāk śuci narttakīyaṃ cittaṃ jahāra tam apārakṛpaṃ namāmi // 2 //

ṛgupaniṣadadurgāt dūrayan yo 'rivargān / adhihari vijayādivyāpta evodapādi //

sa jayati yatirājaḥ sarga uccaivirājaḥ / paridhṛtajayasajñaḥ sarvavidyāsvabhijñaḥ // 3 //

śukena śāntyādiṣu vāṅmayeṣu vyāsena dhairyaṃ budhinopameyam //

manojaṇityāṃ manasāṃ hi patyā raghūttamākhyaṃ suguruṃ namāmi //4//

chandaḥ sāṅgamuraṅgamaṅgalagavīr jaiminyupajñaṃ mata / -vyāsodantam abūbudhac ca samadhād yo viśvanāthābhidhām //

dharme vyākṛtapūrṇadhīkṛtasadācārasmṛtivyākṛti / -vyājena praṇamāmi taṃ pitaram udbodhāya śabdārthayoḥ // 5 //

padādividyābahuvinniṣadyā adhyeṣitatvaiṣivarādyato 'ham /

namāmi taṃ vyāsa[p.52a]kulāvataṃsaṃ nārāyaṇācāryam athāgrajaṃ me //6//

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 683-B-1884-87
column5:
Begins fol 1b.

nirguṇaṃ karadhṛtārvasadguṇaṃ dūradoṣam urudoṣam apy alam /

pārthasārathim apārthasārathiṃ nandanadavatisādhanaṃ numaḥ //1//

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 684-1884-87
column5:
fol. 1b

śriyaḥ sadānandaguṇair bhṛtaṃ bhuje bhuje 'pyadoṣaṃ tadaśeṣaśaktitaḥ // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 684-1887-91
column5:
fol. 1b

nirakṣaram anākāraṃ nirvibhāvyaṃ nirañjanam /

niṣkalānandam advaitaṃ cinmayaṃ taṃ namāmy aham //1// etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 685-1884-87
column5:
oṃ pramāṇajātair avabudhya yasya sāraṃ padaṃ tyaktabhavā bhajante /

janā nijānandapadecchavo 'laṃ taṃ vāsavīsūnum ahaṃ prapadye //1//

śrīmadhvaṃ jayatīrtharājam api ca śrīrāghavānghryambujā /

saktāntaḥkaraṇān raghūttamapatīn ānamya vidyāgurūn //

vedavyāsayatīṃś ca paddhatigatābhiprāyasaṃvarṇanam

vedeśas tanute yatir gurukṛpām ālambya dhīśuddhaye //2//

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 685-1887-91
column5:
fol. 1a

nityānandaikarūpaṃ saccinmātraṃ paraṃ jyotiḥ /

puruṣottamam ajam īśaṃ vande śrīpādavādhīśam //1// etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 686-1884-87
column5:
fol. 1b

samastaguṇasampūrṇaṃ sarvadoṣavivarjitam /

nārāyaṇaṃ namaskatya gītātātparyam ucyate /

śāstreṣu bhāratasāraṃ tatra nāma sahasrakam /

vaiṣṇavaṃ kṛṣṇagītāvatajñānān mucya tejasā / etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 687-1884-87
column5:
fol. 1b 

svabhāvataḥ svatantratvapramukhair nikhilair guṇaiḥ //

vibhinno viśvato viṣṇur jayatāj jagadīśvaraḥ // 1 //

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 688-1884-87
column5:
fol. 1b

pramitā sahavāsi dharmavāsaṃmapi sambhāvayateti bhāvanāya //

narasiṃhaśarīram ādadhāno mayi mūḍhes tu sarasvatīṃ dadhānaḥ // 1 //

brahmaṇyatīrthacaraṇaśrīpāṇyaraṇisambhavaḥ //

madhvatyaktamatāt tāstu vyāsāgnir mattamacchide // 2 //

māyimatte' tha kumbhāri vāsudevo harer mude //

haryālambo vitanute bhedojjīvanaṭippaṇīm // 3 //

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 688-1887-91
column5:
fol. 1b

yo 'vatīrṇa ihācāryarūpeṇa yatināṃ mude //

śrīmannārāyaṇaṃ vande taṃ hariṃ karuṇānidhim // 1 //

mananākhyaṃ prakaraṇaṃ vāsudevayatīśvaraiḥ //

racitaṃ vistareṇādya saṅgraheṇa prakāśyate // 2 //

bālānām upakārāya mamāpi jñānasiddhaye //

tatra śrībālagopālakṛṣṇaḥ sannihito bhavet // 3 //

 

iha khalu dharmārthakāmamokṣāṇāṃ caturṇāṃ puruṣārthānāṃ madhye mokṣa eva parama puruṣārthaḥ // etc

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 688-1887-91
column5:
fol. 64a 

iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīvāsudevānandaviracite mananākhyaprakaraṇe dvādaśaṃ varṇakaṃ samāptam //

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 69-1881-82
column5:
fol. 1b:

pālane vimalasattvavṛttaye janma karmaṇi rajojuṣelaye //

tāmasāya jagataḥ parākṛtadvaitajālavapuṣe namas sate //1//

yasyāḥ prasādam avalambya jagadgurūṇām

apy askhalat bahuguṇāḥ prasavanti vācaḥ //

sā vedaśāstraparinirmitavandyadehā

bhūyāt samagravaradeva sarasvatī naḥ //2//

vighnābhitāpam apahṛtya madīya kṛtya-/

bījaṃ pravṛddhamadanugrahavarṣapāteḥ //

samprārthitas sitataro 'pi gaṇeśameghaḥ /

siñcannabhīṣṭaphalam aṅkurayatyamogham //3//

śyāmāpi śrutikamalāvabodharāgaṃ śāntaḥ san nayati tamovināśamantraḥ //

ṇīrupaṃ prathayati yo 'pi gosahasres taṃ vyāsaṃ namata jagatyapūrvabhānum //4//

uddhṛtya vedapayasaḥ kamalām ivābdher āliṅgitākhilajagatprabhavekamūrtti /

vidyāmaheśajagatāṃ sukhadāmadādyas taṃ śaṅkaraṃ vimalabhāṣyakṛtaṃ namāmi //5//

vande tam ātmasambuddhasphuradbrahmāvabodhataḥ //

arthatas tu na nāmneva yo 'nanyānubhavo guruḥ //6//

 

fol. 1b: prakāśātmā yatiḥ samyak prāptavidyāśuśrūśayā //

yathāśrutaṃ yathāśakti vyākhyāsye pañcapādikām //7//

viditasakalavedyair na praśaṃsanti loke grathita ...(lost) mādṛśena // iti viphalasame 'smin vāgvyaye 'haṃ pravṛttaḥ svamati vimalatāyai kṣantum arhati (santaḥ) //8//

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 691-1887-91
column5:
fol. 1b

yadavidyāvilāsena bhūtabhauktika sṛṣṭayaḥ / 

taṃ naumi paramātmānaṃ saccidānandavigraham // 1 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 692-1884-87
column5:
fol. 1a

narasiṃham asaṃhyoru pratyūhatimirāpaham /

praṇipatya vyākariṣye māyāvādasya khaṇḍanam //

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 692-1887-91
column5:
fol. 1b

vāgīśādyāḥ sumanasaḥ sarvārthānām upakrame /

yaṃ natvā kṛtakṛtyāsyur taṃ namāmi gajānanam //

naidādyā bhānukiraṇeṣv iva vāripūraḥ

sarvo vibhāti yadabodhavaśāt prapañcaḥ / 

māyāphaṇīvacanimīlati yatprabodhāt

tadbrahma naumi sukham advayam ātmarūpam // 2 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 693-1884-87
column5:
fol. 1b

oṃ śrīrāmaṃ hanumatsevyaṃ śrīkṛṣṇaṃ bhīmasevitam /

śrīvyāsaṃ śrīmadānandatīrthasaṃsevituṃ bhaje // 1 //

praṇamya yādavācāryagurūṇāṃ pādapaṅkaje /

vyākhyāsye durgamāṃ māyāvādakhaṇḍanapañcikām // 2 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 693-1887-91
column5:
fol. 1b

rāsānandaṃ guruṃ natvā paramānandam advayam /

vakṣye vedāntasārasya ṭikā nāmnāṃ subodhinīm // 1 //

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 694-1884-87
column5:
fol. 1a

namāmi jānakījāniṃ duṣṭarakṣo nibarhaṇam /

samastaguṇasampūrṇaṃ bhaktānugrahakāraṇam // 1 //

naumi satyānidhiṃ yasmād vijayaḥ sarvadā mama /

bhavaty evākhilajñānasidhdyarthajñānadaṃ gurum // 2 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 694-1887-91
column5:
fol. 1b

Text

śrīrāmabhadrasaṃyamicaraṇau śaraṇaṃ vidhāya bodhāya /

siddhāntacandrikāmṛtasekaiḥ saṃśodhayāmi cetaḥ svam // 3 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 694-1887-91
column5:
fol. 1b

Comm:

praṇamadamaramauliprasphuradratnaraśmi-

prakaravimaladīpair nityanīrājitāṅghriḥ /

śiśirakaraṇadhārī yogihṛtpadmacārī

kṛpayatu mayi sāmbaḥ ko 'pi saṃvitkadambaḥ // //etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 695-1844-87
column5:
fol. 1b

namo 'gaṇitakalyāṇaguṇapūrṇāya viṣṇave /

satyāśeṣajagajjanma pūrvakartre muradviṣe // 1 //

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 695-1887-91
column5:
fol. 1b

adhigatabhidā pūrvācān upetya sahasradhā

sarid iva mahībhedān samprāpya śauripadodgatā /

jayati bhagavatpādaśrīmanmukhāmbujanirgatā

jananahariṇī sūktibrahmādvayaikaparāyaṇā // 1 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 696-1884-87
column5:
Begins fol. 1a

śrīrāmaṃ hanumatsevyaṃ śrīkṛṣṇaṃ bhīmasevitam /

śrīvyāsaṃ madhvasaṃsevyaṃ samastābhīṣṭadaṃ bhaje // 1 //

śrīmadānandatīrthāryacaraṇāv āśraye niśam /

rudrādi sarvavibudhai saṃsevyāviṣṭadau satām // 2 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 696-A-1882-83
column5:
fol. 1b

śriyaḥ sadānandaguṇair bhṛtaṃ bhuje etc.

column5:
fol.1b

nikhilaguṇanikāyaṃ nityanirdhūtahethaṃ // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 697-1882-83
column5:
fol. b

nirguṇaṃ karadhṛtārvasadguṇaṃ dūradoṣam urudoṣam apy alam /

pārthasārathim apārthasārathiṃ nandanandatatisādhanaṃ numaḥ //1//

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 697-1884-87
column5:
fol. 1b

viśvassyodayam ātanoti tadanutrāṇam vidhatte punaḥ 

saukhyāprītarahāni sādhanamalaṃ vaktiśrutīr vyañjayan /

svāpaṃ prāpayati śramāpahṛtaye kalpāvasāne ca ya-

s taṃ devaṃ pitaraṃ patiṃ gurutamaṃ vande ramāvallabham // 1 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 698-1882-83
column5:
fol. 1a

natvā viśvodayasthemalayahetuṃ patiṃ śriyaḥ /

kurmaḥ prapañcamithyāthvamānakhaṇḍanapañcikām //1//

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 698-1884-87
column5:
fol. 1b

devaṃ nārāyaṇam natvā pūrṇabodhādikān gurūn /

vivṛṇomi yathābodhaṃ tatvanirnayapañcikām // 1 //

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 699-1882-83
column5:
fol. 1b

natvā viśvodayasthe malayahetuṃ patiṃ śriyaḥ /

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 699-1884-87
column5:
fol. 1b

natvā śriśaṃ gurūn sarvān gururājoktamārgataḥ /

tatvanirṇayaṭīkāyāḥ bhāvaṃ vakṣye yathāmati //

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 7-1919-24
column5:
natvā śrībhāratītīrthavidyāraṇyamunīśvarau /

pratyaktatvavivekasya kriyate padadīpikā //1//

oṃ namaḥ śrīśaṅkarānandagurupādāmbujanmane /

savilāsamahāmohasāhagrāsairukarmaṇe //1//

tatpādāmburuhadvandvasevānirmalacetasām /

sukhabodhāya tattvasya viveko 'yaṃ vidhīyate //2//

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 700-1882-83
column5:
fol. 1b

praṇamya caraṇāmbhojayuguḷaṃ kamaḷāpateḥ /

pramāṇapaddhatiṃ kurmo bāḷānāṃ bodhasiddhaye //1//

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 700-1884-87
column5:
fol. 1b

śrīrāmaṃ hanumatsevyaṃ śrīkṛṣṇaṃ bhīmasevitam /

śrīvyāsaṃ madhvasaṃsevyaṃ samastābhīṣṭadaṃ bhaje // 1 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 701-1882-83
column5:
fol. 1b

praṇamyāgaṇyakalyāṇaguṇābdhiṃ puruṣottamam /

pūṛṇabodhān api gurūn vyākurve mānalakṣaṇam //1//

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 701-1884-87
column5:
fol. 1b

nārāyaṇam asaṅkhyeya kalyāṇaguṇavigrahaṃ /

vande bhaktyā sadādhvastadūṣaṇaṃ paramapriyam //

namo bhagavate tasmai vyāsarūpāya viṣṇave /

yatprasādāt paraṃ jñānaṃ prāpyate vibudhādibhiḥ //

śrīmadānandatīrthākhyān gurūn vidyādivākarān /

vande kudaṣṭidurbodhavyāsasiddhāntadīpikān //

tatkṛtāṃ brahmasūtrāṇām anuvyākhyāṃ yathāmati /

vivṛṇomy arthagambhīraṃ haritatvaprakāśikam // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 701-1887-91
column5:
fol. 1b

 śrīmān veṅkaṭanāryaḥ kavitārkkikakeśarī /

vedāntācāryavaryo me sannidhattāṃ sadā hṛdi // 1 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 704-1882-83
column5:
fol. 1b

nārāyaṇaṃ guṇaiḥ sarvaiḥ udīrṇaṃ doṣavarjitam

jñeyaṃ gamyaṃ gurūṃś cāpi natvā sūtrārtha ucyate //1// etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 704-1887-91
column5:
fol. 1

Text:

jayati śrīgovindo gopīnāthaḥ sa madanagopālaḥ /

vakṣyāmi yasya kṛpayā prameyaratnāvalīṃ sūkṣmām //1// etc.

 

Comm.:

gauḍodayam upayātas tamaḥ samastaṃ nihanti yo yugapad /

jyotiś ca yo 'tiśītaḥ pītas tam upāsmahe kṛtāñjalayaḥ //

vidyābhūṣaṇāparanāmnā baladevena śrīgovindaikāntinā brahmasūtreṣu govindabhāṣyābhidhānaṃ vyākhyānaṃ viracitam / etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 706-1882-83
column5:
fol. 1a

nārayaṇaṃ guṇaiḥ sa-r udīrṇaṃ doṣavarjitam /

jñeyaṃ gamyaṃ gurūṃś cāpi natvā sūtrārtha ucyate //1// etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 706-1887-91
column5:
fol. 1a

narasiṃham asahyoru pratyūhatimirāpaham /

praṇipatya vyākariṣye māyāvādasya khaṇḍanam // 1 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 707-1884-87
column5:
fol. 1b

śrībhaṭṭapādotthitadhūliśeṣaṃ natvākhileśaṃ nikhilair upāsyam /

nimbārkaśāstraśravaṇālaśānāṃ bodhāya yatnaṃ vidadhe suramyam // 1 //

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 708-1882-83
column5:
fol. 1b

nārayaṇaṃ guṇaiḥ sarvair udīrṇaṃ doṣavarjitam /

jñeyaṃ gamyaṃ gurūṃś cāpi natvā sūtrārtha ucyate //1// etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 708-1884-87
column5:
fol. 1b

śrībhaṭṭapādotthitadhūliśeṣaṃ etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 709-1882-83
column5:
fol. 1b

nārāyaṇaṃ nikhilapūrṇaguṇaikadeham

nirdoṣam āpyatamam apy akhilaiḥ suvākyaiḥ /

asyodbhavād idam aśeṣaviśeṣato 'pi

vandyaṃ sadā priyatamaṃ mama sannamāmi //1// etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 709-1884-87
column5:
Begins fol. 1b

śrīmate nimbādityāya bhagavate namo namaḥ //

caturo vai caturvyūhān guruśiṣyān anukramāt /

kṛṣṇamukhyān namaskṛtya haṃsaguhyamathārjyate // 1 //

oṃ namo namo nārāyaṇāya puruṣāya mahātmane /

viśuddhasatvadhiṣṭyāya mahāhaṃsāya dhīmahi // 2 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 710-1882-83
column5:
Begins fol. 1b

Text: fol. 2a

jayati jananivāso devakījanmavādo

yaduvaraṣatsvair vorbhirasyannadharmam (?) /

sthirataravṛjinaghnaḥ susmitaśrīmukhena

vrajapuravanitānāṃ varddhayan kāmadevam //1// etc.

 

Comm: fol. 1b

śrīrādhāvaragiravaracandro jayati /

bhūyād bhadrāya jagatāṃ kṛṣṇaḥ kamalalocanaḥ /

kālindīkelisaṃhṛṣṭo meghaśyāmo 'tisundaraḥ //1// etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 710-1884-87
column5:
fol. 1b

nimbārkācāryavaro munīśvaraḥ satsaṅkriyāpañcakam ādivarṇitaṃ /

ārebha ātmīya hṛdi sthitaṃ dhruvaṃ sacchiṣyam uddiśya nirūpayiṣyati //

tvaṃ śrīnivāsānugasanniśāmayasatsaṃskriyāpañcakam ādisiddham /

saṃvarṇayete śrutibhir nirūpitaṃ govindabhaktānudhṛtaṃ sanātanam // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 714-1882-83
column5:
fol. 1b

kamalāramaṇaṃ natvā pūṛnabodheṣṭadaivatam /

vyākurve viśvamithyātvamānakhaṇḍanapanñcikām // 1 //

spaṣṭārtho ya iha granthaḥ sa navyā kriyate mayā //

granthagauravabhīrutvān nacodgranthaṃ bahūcyate // 2 //

prapañcamithyātvānumānakhaṇdanaṃ vyācikhyāsur jayatīrthācāryavaryo granthādau maṅgalam ācaran cikīrṣitaṃ nirdiśati // natveti // etc

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 714-A-1887-91
column5:
fol. 1b

natvā svācāryapādābjaṃ kṛpāmadhusupūritam /

tatparāgāraktabuddhyā vyākhyāsye bhaktivarddhinīm //1//

tadbuddhidṛḍhatāsidhdyai pitṛpādarajāsyaham /

hṛdyādhāya pravṛtto 'sminnābhyateti hi niścitam //2// etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 715-1882-83
column5:
fol. 1b

narasiṃham asahyoru pratyūhatimirāpaham /

praṇipatya vyākariṣye māyāvādasya khaṇḍanam // 1 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 715-1887-91
column5:
fol. 1b

yatpādamūlam upasṛtya viśanti śaśvat

vṛṇdāvanadrumalatābhujapūjitāṅghrim /

so 'yaṃ samastajagatām abhivandanīya

pādāṃbujaḥ sakaruṇaḥ priyam ātanotu //1// etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 716-1882-83
column5:
fol. 1b

narasiṃham asahyoru pratyūhatimirāpaham /

praṇipatya vyākariṣye māyāvādasya khaṇḍanam // 1 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 716-1887-91
column5:
fol. 1b

viśeṣaiḥ prākṛtaiḥ śūnyam aprākṛtaviśeṣavat /

aśeṣopaniṣadvedyaṃ paraṃ brahmāstu te mude //1//

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 716-B-1884-87
column5:
Begins fol. 2b

natvā hariṃ sadānandaṃ sarvasiddhāntasaṅgraham /

bālaprabodhanārthāya vadāmi suviniścitam //1//

dharmārthakāmamokṣāś ca (ca)tvāro 'rthā manīṣiṇām /

jīveśvaravicāreṇa dvidhā te hi vicāritāḥ //2//

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 717-1882-83
column5:
fol. 1a 

śrīrāmahanumatsevyaṃ śrīkṛṣṇyāṃ bhīmasevitam /

śrīvyāsaṃ śrīmadānandatīrtha saṃsevitaṃ bhaje // 1 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 717-1887-91
column5:
fol. 1b

natvā śrīvallabhācāryapādapadmayugaṃ mudā /

tadīya bhāṣyamārgeṇa vyāsasūtrārtha īryate //1//

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 718-1887-91
column5:
fol. 1b

pitṛpādābjayugalaṃ praṇamāmi kṛpā madhu /

yatkulaṃ gokuleśena svīkṛtaṃ kṛpayā svataḥ //1//

atas tadvadanāmbhojacyutagītāmṛtāmbudheḥ /

āvirbhāve hetum īśānugrahād vimṛśāmy ahaṃ //2// etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 719-1882-83
column5:
fol. 1b

sadāgamaikavijñeyaṃ samatītakṣarākṣaram /

nārāyaṇaṃ sadā vande nirdoṣāśeṣasadguṇam // 1 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 719-1887-91
column5:
fol. 1b

bhaktikalpalatābījasthāyibhāvātmane svataḥ /

pūṣṭijīvahṛdisthāya śrīmadbhagavate namaḥ //1//

bhaktikalpalatotpattivṛddhidohadadāyakān /

namāmi śrīmadācāryan prabhūn dīnānukampinaḥ //2//

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 72-1882-83
column5:
fol. 1b

svavidyākalpitadvaitaṃ narasiṃhābhidhaṃ mahaḥ /

vedāntavedyaṃ vande 'haṃ paramānandavigraham // etc. //

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 721-1884-87
column5:
fol. 1b

natvā svācāryapādābjaṃ kṛpā madhu sūpūritam /

tatarāgāraktabudhyā vyākhyāsye bhaktivarddhinīm // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 722-1884-87
column5:
fol. 1b

yadaṅghrisaṅgisaṅgena niḥsaṅgās saṅgino 'ṅginaḥ /

bhavanti bhāgino bhaktes tam īśaṃ vikalaṃ namaḥ //1//

bhaktibhāgīrathītīre haṃsāḥ kaṃsārisāriṇaḥ /

ruvanti rucirā rāvā yadrutaṃ tad udīryate //2//

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 723-1882-83
column5:
fol. 1b

govindacaraṇāmbhojamadhuno mahad adbhutaṃ /

yatpāyino na muhyanti muhyanti yadapāyinaḥ //1//

prapadya paramaṃ devaṃ śrīsvapneśvarasūriṇā /

śāṇḍilyaśatasūtrīyaṃ bhāṣyam ābhāṣyate 'dhunā //2//

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 723-1887-91
column5:
fol. 1b

 nijamuralikānādāhvānāgatavrajasundarī

nirupamanavasnehāmbhodher vicitratarormibhiḥ /

kimapi paritacārdrārdro 'stu svayaṃ prakaṭībhavan

pratiyuvatisambhedanāsmaddṛśāṃ viṣayaḥ sadā // 1 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 724-1884-87
column5:
Text: fol. 1b

śṛīkṛṣṇaṃ paramānandaṃ daśalīlāyutaṃ sadā /

sarvabhaktasamuddhāre visphurantaṃ paraṃ numah // 1 //

 

Comm: fol. 1b

śrībhāgavataprakaraṇaṃ vyācikhyāsus tatpratipādyarupaṃ bhagavantaṃ saṅkīrtanena statuti // śrīkṛṣṇam iti / etc

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 725-1884-87
column5:
Text fol. 1b

namoṃ….. kṛṣṇāyādbhutakarmaṇe /

rūpānām avibhedena jagat krīḍati yo yataḥ // 1 //

 

Comm.

sarvoddhāraorayatnātmā kṛṣṇaḥ prādurbabhūva ha /

tathā tvaṃ yena saṃsidhdyet tadarthaṃ vyāsa uktavān // etc

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 725-1887-91
column5:
fol. 1b

jayati jananivāso devakī janmavādo

yaduvarapariṣatsvair ddobhir asyanna dharmam /

sthiracaravṛjinaghnaḥ sasmitaśrīmukhena

vrajapuravanitānāṃ varddhayan kāmadevam //1// etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 725-1887-91
column5:
fol. 1b

ye mukāv api nispṛhāḥ pratipadapronmīladānandadāṃ

yām āsyāya samastamastakamaṇiṃ kurvanti yaṃ sve vaśe /

tān bhaktān api tāṃ ca bhaktim api taṃ bhaktapriyaṃ śrīhariṃ

vande tantatam arthaye 'nudivasaṃ nityaṃ śaraṇyaṃ bhaje //1// etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 725A-1887-91
column5:
fol. 1b

ye muktāv api nispṛhāḥ pratipadapronmīladānandadām / etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 726-1884-87
column5:
fol. 1b

Text:

namaḥ pitṛpadāmbhojareṇubhyo yannivedanāt /

asmatkulaṃ niṣkalaṅkaṃ śrikṛṣṇenātmasātkṛtam // 1 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 726-1884-87
column5:
fol. 1b

Comm.:

mayi niḥsādhane dīne karuṇaḥ samprasīdatu /

svadāsārthakṛtāśeṣasādhano vallabhaḥ prabhuḥ // 1 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 726-1887-91
column5:
fol. 1b

viśveśvaraṃ namaskṛtya svargamokṣapradā śubhāḥ / 

saṃgṛhyate kalau dharmāḥsarvapāpapraṇāśakāḥ // 1 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 727-1884-87
column5:
fol. 1b

yatpādarajasāgatya mano me cañcalīkṛtam /

tatkṛtācāryapadyānāṃ vivṛtau yatpravarttate // 1 //

vivṛteḥ saphalatvāya natvā pitṛpadāmbujam /

vivṛtiḥ kartum ārabdhān ativiśvāsato mayā // 2 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 727-1887-91
column5:
fol.1b

akhilarasāmṛtamūrtiḥ prasṛmararuciruddhatārakāpāliḥ

kalitaśyāmalalato rādhāpreyānvidhur jayati //1// etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 728-1887-91
column5:
fol. 1b

sanātanasamo yasya jyāyān śrīmān sanātanaḥ /

śrīvallabhānujaḥ so 'sau śrīrūpo jīvasadgatiḥ //

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 729-1884-87
column5:
fol. 1b

nijamuralikānandātkānāgatavrajasundarī

nirupamanavasnehāmbhodher vicitratarormibhiḥ /

kimapi paritacārdrārdro 'stu svayaṃ prakaṭībhavan

pratiyuvatisambhedanāsmadṛśāṃ viṣayaḥ sadā // 1 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 73-1882-83
column5:
fol. 1b

yataḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni pratibhānti sthitāni ca /

yatraivopaśamaṃ yānti tasmai satyātmane namaḥ // 1 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 730-1884-87
column5:
Begins fol. 1b

śrīkṛṣṇa //

namāmi śrīmadācāryacaraṇāmburuhadvayaṃ /

yatkṛpāleśato buddhiḥ śrīmatprabhutkṛtau bhavet // 1 //

śrīviṭhṭhaleśacaraṇaṃ kleśarāśivināśakam /

vande viśeṣavijñānasaṃsidhyai tatkṛtau bhavet // 2 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 731-1887-91
column5:
oṃ rudrakṣetrajñavargas samudayati yato yatra viśrāntimṛcched

yattattvaṃ yasya bimbaṃ sphuritamayamiyadyanmayaṃ viśvam etat // 

svācchandyānandavṛndechaladamṛtamayānuttaraspandatatvam

caitanyaṃ śāṅkaraṃ tajjayati yadakhilaṃ dvaitabhāsādvayātma // 1 //

āsamañjasyam ālokya vṛttinām iha tattvataḥ /

śivasūtraṃ vyākaromi gurvāmnāyavigānataḥ // 2 //

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 732-1884-87
column5:
fol. 1b

muktāśraye ratnaviśeṣasevye śukadināṇḍhaye (?) sumanodhigamye /

kṣaṇaṃ gavendrasya padāmbujāseviaśramyatāṃ mānasarājahaṃsa // 1 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 733-1884-87
column5:
fol. 2a

Text:

namāmi hṛdaye śeṣe līlākṣīrābdhiśāyinam /

lakṣmīsahasralīlābhiḥ sevyamānaṃ kalānidhim // 1 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 733-1884-87
column5:
fol. 1a

Comm:

śrīkṛṣṇasya vaco vande durbodhaṃ viduṣām api /

tayākhyātṛvaco vande tatsubodhatvasādhanam // 1 //

vyācakhyur ye brahmavādaṃ bhaktimārgāvirodhataḥ /

vande tān śrīmadācāryān  vedavedāntapāragān // 2 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 735-1884-87
column5:
fol. 1b

ye muktāv api nispṛhāḥ pratipadapronmīladānandadām /

yām āsthāya samastamastakamaṇiṃ kurvanti yaṃ sve vaśe //

tān bhaktān api tāṃ ca bhaktim api taṃ bhaktapriyaṃ śrīharim /

vande santatam arthaye 'nudivasaṃ nityaṃ śaraṇyaṃ bhaje //1// etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 739-1884-87
column5:
fol. 1b

vande śrīnṛsiṃheśa puṇyāraṇyaṃ gurūttamam /

śrīsāmamantrarājīṃ ca vaiṣṇavān hārddasiddhaye //

āvirbabhūva loke 'smin sadbhaktālhādadāyakaḥ /

śrīviṣṇubhakticandrodayaṃ viṣṇupremādvivardhanaḥ // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 74-1882-83
column5:
fol. 1b

Comm:

yataḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni pratibhāti sthitāni ca / etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 740-1884-87
column5:
fol. 1b

Text:

pitā parāśaro yasya śukadevasya yaḥ pitā /

taṃ vyāsaṃ vadarīvāsaṃ kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaṃ bhaje // 1 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 740-1884-87
column5:
fol. 1b

Comm: 

syāmo 'pi yaḥ śrutisaroruhabodharaktaḥ

śānto 'pi yaḥ syatitamastatimantarasthām /

pratyakapadaṃ disati yaḥ paramaṃ svagobhi-

r vyāsaṃ tama dbhutaraviṃ śaraṇaṃ prapadye //

vedaṃ tadvācyaṃ ca pareśaṃ durdhiyo nāstikā na manyate kecic cāstikābhāsāḥ samāśrayantyst ardhardhakukuṭīyam / etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 741-1884-87
column5:
fol. 1b

Text:

vedās tathā smṛtigiro 'yam acintyaśaktiṃ

sṛṣṭisthitipralayakāraṇam āmananti /

taṃ śyāmasnṃdaram aviktiyam ātmamūrtim

sarveśvaraṃ praṇati mātravaśaṃ bhajāmaḥ // 1 / etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 741-1884-87
column5:
fol. 1b

Comm:

yasya śrīmannāmapīyūṣavarṣair āsīd viśvaṃ dhūtatāpaṅkilaitat /

svāvirbhāvollāsitānandasindhur jīyāt sa śrīkṛṣṇacaitanyacandraḥ // 1 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 742-1884-87
column5:
fol. 1b

ṇā pūrṇamīsvarāṇāṃ mahesvarīṃ bhaktaka......

...... tamokṣān hareḥ priyān bhaktiniṣṭhān...... etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 745-1884-87
column5:
fol. 1a

atha dehābhimānasādhārṇa(raṇa) dharmajñānotpattiprakarṇaṃ granthaṃ likhyate / śloka //

vande 'haṃ saccidānandaṃ bhedātīta hi sadgurum /

nityaṃ pūrṇaṃ nirākāraṃ nirguṇaṃ svātmasaṃsthitam // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 75-1882-83
column5:
fol. 1b

yataḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni pratibhāti sthitāni ca / 

yatraivopaśamaṃ yānti tasmai satyātmane namaḥ // 1 // etc.

column5:
fol. 1b

oṃ namo 'vyaktarūpāya parabrahmasvarūpiṇe //

śabdarūparasasparśagandhādyākāravarjite //1//

syād arvācīnaparācīnāvasthābhedena tu dvidhā /

spṛṣṭipālanasaṃhārakādidevātrayātmakam //2// etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 766-1891-95
column5:
fol. 1b

karotu turagagrīvo mākarah karuṇāṃ mayi /

surāsuraśirohāri ratnarāji padāmbujaḥ //1//

anantamatirannānām ākarāpārasāgarān /

garīyaso gurūn naumi svāntamohāpahāriṇaḥ // 2 //

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 768-A-1891-95
column5:
Text: fol. 1b

// namaḥ śrīśaṅkarānandagurupādāmbujanmane //etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 768-F-1891-95
column5:
