natvā śrībhāratītīrthavidyāraṇyamunīśvarau /

artho nāṭakadīpasya mayā saṅkṣipya vakṣyate // 1 // etc

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 769-1891-95
column5:
fol. 1b:

abhūtadvaitajālāya sākṣiṇe brahmaṇe namaḥ //1//

namaḥ śrutiśiraḥ padmaṣaṇḍamārtaṇḍamūrttaye //

bādarāyaṇasaṃjñāya munaye śamaveśmane //2//

namāmy abhogiparivārasampadaṃ nirastabhūtim anumārkṣavigraham //

anugram unmṛditakālalāñchanaṃ vinā vināyakam apūrvaśaṅkaram //3//

yadvattkramānasasaraḥ pratilabdhajanmabhāṣyāravindamakarandarasaṃ pibanti //

pratyāśam unmukhavinītavineyabhṛṅgās tān bhāṣyavittakagurūn praṇamāmi mūrdhnā //4//

column5:
fol. 1b

tamoguṇavināśinīsakalakālamudyotinī // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 771-1891-95
column5:
fol. 1b

praṇamya paramānandaṃ mohāndhatimirāpaham /

tatprasādabalenaiva kriyate bālabodhinī //1//etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 772-1891-95
column5:
fol. 1b

praṇamya paramānandaṃ mohāndhatimirāpaham /

tatprasādabalenaiva kriyate bālabodhinī //1// etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 774-1891-95
column5:
fol. 1b

kiñcitkutūhalenaiva viduṣāṃ priyakāmyayā /

maṅgalācaraṇaṃ kṛtvā bodhasāro nirūpyate //1//

anantaśaktisandohapūrṇasya paramātmanaḥ /

vighnavidhvaṃsinīṃ śaktiṃ gaṇarājam upāsmahe //2//

fol. 1b

namāmi yadrajoyogāt pāṣāṇo 'pi sukhaṃ gataḥ //1//

saṅgatiḥ saṃśayaḥ pūrvaṃ parapakṣau tayoḥ phalam /

bhāṣyasthāḥ śrutayaḥ sarvāḥ sūtrāṇy anavaśeṣataḥ //2//

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 776-1891-95
column5:
fol. 1b

svalīnacidacidacicchaktī praviśya ko 'py abhūj jagat /

bhinno bhinnaś ca tābhyāṃ yo haṃsaḥ so haṃsano gatiḥ /etc.

fol. 1b

yat jñānāj jīvato muktir utkrāntigativarjitā /

labhyate tatparaṃ brahma rāmanāmāsmi nirbhayam //

fol. 1b

yadavidyāvilāsena bhūtabhauktika sṛṣṭayaḥ /  

taṃ naumi paramātmānaṃ saccidānandavigraham // 1 // etc.

column5:
fol. 1b

Text:

yadavidyāvilāsena etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 782-1891-95
column5:
fol. 1b

Comm:

yayuṃ cakruṃ devaṃ haram acalam ārādhyam amaraiḥ

sahorāpyaṃ vīdhraṃ kharujanadurāpaṃ śubhakaram /

pareśaṃ sarveṣāṃ atatyam amṛtaṃ sarvam atulam 

bhaje 'haṃ taṃ viṣṇuṃ śivam akhilavedāntaviditam // 1 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 783-1891-95
column5:
fol 1a

akhaṇḍaṃ saccidāndam avāṅmanasagocaram /

ātmānam akhilādhāram āśraye 'bhīṣṭasiddhaye // 1 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 784-1891-95
column5:
fol. 2a

Text: 

akhaṇḍaṃ saccidāndam avāṅmanasagocaram / etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 784-1891-95
column5:
fol. 1b

Comm:

kṛṣṇānandaṃ guruṃ natvā paramānandam advayam /

vakṣye vedāntasārasya ṭikā nāmnā subodhinīm // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 785-1891-95
column5:
fol. 1b

rāmaṃ sarvaguṇātītaṃ māyāguṇasamāśrayam /

natvā vedāntasiddhāntadīpikeyaṃ pratanyate // 1 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 786-1891-95
column5:
fol. 1b

aguṇāya guṇāḍhyāya svātmane 'nantarūpiṇe /

śuddhāya svaprakāśāya śrīrāmamunaye namaḥ // 1 //

nirguṇasyāprameyasya śuddhasyāpy amalātmanaḥ /

kathaṃ sargādikaṛtrvaṃ brahmaṇe 'py upapadyate // 2 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 791-1891-95
column5:
fol. 1a

svātmaikatatvaṃ paramaṃ viśuddham

satvaṃ sabodhaḥ gaganopamaṃ moham /

cidātmaboddhaṃ vimalaṃ bīśuddham

taṃ tatvabodhaṃ svayaseva boddham // 1 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 792-1891-95
column5:
fol. 1b

śrīgurucaraṇadvandvaṃ vande 'haṃ mathitadusahadvandvam /

bhrāntigrahopaśāntiṃ pāṃsumayaṃ yasya bhasitam ātanute // 1 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 801-1891-95
column5:
fol. 1a

śrībhaṭṭapādotthitadhūliśeṣaṃ natvākhileśaṃ nikhilair upāsyam /

nimbārkaśāstraśravaṇālaśānāṃ bodhāya yatnaṃ vidadhe suramyam // 1 //

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 802-1891-85
column5:
fol. 1b

nijamuralikānādāhvānāgatavrajasundarī

nirupanavasnehāmbhodher vicitratarormibhiḥ /

kimapi paritacārdrārdo 'stu svayaṃ prakaṭībhavan

pratiyuvatisambhedanāsmaddṛśāṃ viṣayaḥ sadā // 1 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 803-1891-95
column5:
fol. 1b

śrīkṛṣṇadevamukhapadmamarandapūrṇa-

vākyānuvādavinivāritajīvadoṣam /

ācāryavaryacaraṇau hṛdaye nidhāya

jatvā vacas taduditaṃ vivṛṇoti dāsaḥ // 1 //

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 804-1891-95
column5:
fol. 1a

atha śrīvallabhācāryacaraṇāviṣṭacetasā /

kārikābhiḥ svasiddhāntarahasyārtho vivicyate // 1 //

svarūpeṇa samuddhāras tathā bhaktyāpi caiva hi /

vyavasthā tatra mantavyāvatārānavatārataḥ // 2 // etc.

column2: Maṅgala passage of MS Pune BORI 806-1891-95
column5:
fol. 1a

svātmapracchādanakrīḍāvidagdhaḥ parameśvaraḥ //

yo 'yaṃ vyadhāyi guruṇā muktyā paramārthsārasaṃkṣepaḥ /

vivṛttiṃ karomi laghvīm asmin vidvajjanārthito yogaḥ //etc.

Country paper; thick and greyish; Devanāgarī  characters handwriting large, bold and legible; fols. 1, 3, 5, 7 and 9 coloured with yellow pigment; fol. 7 is of special interest in that 7a has only a line and a half and 7b only three lines; similarly similarly fol. 3b has 4 ½ lines, fol. 4a 3 lines.

Age: The Ms. Is not very old.
Author: Anonymous.
[1. Evidently for kalpakhaṇḍe, which would give us the title of the work as amanaskakalpakhaṇḍa, Cf. Ind. Off. Cat. I, iv. P. 602a for identical work.]
